anya-e0804n0:8_0: I gatiyaṁ. Yesaṁ dhātūnaṁ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṁ attho. Pavattipāpuṇānipi. Tatra
anya-e0804n0:8_1: gamanaṁ duvidhaṁ kāyagamanaṁ ñāṇagamanañca. Tesu kāyagamanaṁ nāma iriyāpathagamanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:8_2: ñāṇagamanaṁ nāma ñāṇuppatti, tasmā payogānurūpena ‘‘gacchatī’’ti padassa ‘‘jānātī’’tipi
anya-e0804n0:8_3: attho bhavati, ‘‘pavattatī’’tipi attho bhavati, ‘‘pāpuṇātī’’tipi attho bhavati, iriyāpathagamanena
anya-e0804n0:8_4: gacchatītipi attho bhavati, ñāṇagamanena gacchatītipi attho bhavati. Tathā hi ‘‘sīghaṁ
anya-e0804n0:8_5: gacchatī’’tiādīsu iriyāpathagamanaṁ ‘‘gamana’’nti vuccati. Sundaraṁ nibbānaṁ gato.
anya-e0804n0:8_6: ‘‘Gatimā’’tiādīsu pana ñāṇagamanaṁ. Evaṁ sabbesampi gatyatthānaṁ dhātūnaṁ yathāpayogaṁ attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:9_0: Tassimāni rūpāni bhavanti – iti, eti, udeti. Kārite ‘‘udāyatī’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:9_1: Uṭṭhāpetīti hi attho, dukāro āgamo. Upeti, samupeti, veti, apeti, aveti, anveti,
anya-e0804n0:9_2: sameti, abhisameti, samayo, abhisamayo, īdi, udi, ekodi, paṇḍito, ito, udito, upeto,
anya-e0804n0:9_3: samupeto, anvito, apeto, sameto, etabbo, paccetabbo, paṭiyamāno, paṭicco, ento, adhippeto,
anya-e0804n0:9_4: adhippāyo, paccayo, aññānipi yojetabbāni. ‘‘Itā, ita’’ntiādinā yathārahaṁ itthinapuṁsakavasenapi.
anya-e0804n0:9_5: Paccetuṁ, upetuṁ, samupetuṁ, anvetuṁ, sametuṁ, abhisametuṁ, icca, paṭicca, samecca,
anya-e0804n0:9_6: abhisamecca, apecca, upecca, paṭimukhaṁ itvā, itvāna, upetvā, upetvāna, upetuna,
anya-e0804n0:11: Idamettha na vattabbaṁ, dassanāyeva me ruto.
anya-e0804n0:17_0: Tatra itāyanti iti ayanti chedo. Itiiti ca gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ayaṁ panettha
anya-e0804n0:17_1: suttapadattho – yo doso loke ‘‘kodho’’ti lokiyamahājanena vuccati, nāyaṁ atthato
anya-e0804n0:17_2: kodhoti vattabbo. Kinti pana vattabbo, eso hi sarīrasaṅkhātaguhāsayo maccurājā eva
anya-e0804n0:17_3: kodhavasena pamaddanto sattasantāne gacchatīti vattabbo. Taṁ evarūpaṁ ‘‘maccurājā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:17_4: vattabbaṁ bahuno janassa anatthakaraṁ kodhaṁ hitakāmo damena paññāya vīriyena diṭṭhiyā ca chindeyyāti.
anya-e0804n0:18_0: Etīti imassa pana āgacchatīti attho. ‘‘Etī’’ti ettha hi āupasaggo sandhikiccena paṭicchannattā
anya-e0804n0:18_1: na pākaṭo valāhakāvattharito puṇṇacando viya. Tathā hi ettha ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho
anya-e0804n0:18_2: bhavati, ākārassa ca ikārena parena saddhiṁyeva ekārādeso. Tasmā ‘‘ayaṁ so sārathī
anya-e0804n0:18_3: eti. Etu vessantaro rājā’’tiādīsu ‘‘āgacchati, āgacchatū’’tiādinā attho kathetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:18_4: Byākaraṇasatthepi hi ā iti etīti sandhiviggaho dissati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ
anya-e0804n0:18_5: manasi kātabbā. Atha vā itīti rassavasena vuttaṁ padaṁ gamanaṁ bodheti, etīti vuddhivasena
anya-e0804n0:18_6: vuttaṁ pana yathāpayogaṁ āgamanādīni. Mattāvasenapi hi padāni savisesatthāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:18_7: Taṁ yathā? Sāsane pabbajito, raṭṭhā pabbājitoti. Saññogāsaññogavasenapi, taṁ yathā?
anya-e0804n0:18_8: Gāmā niggacchati. Yasaṁ poso nigacchati, tasmā ayampi nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:19: I gatiyanti kathitā, dhātu vuddhiṁ gatā yadā;
anya-e0804n0:24: Āgamane ca hotīti, dhīmā lakkheyya taṁ yathā.
anya-e0804n0:29_0: Tathā hi ītīti anatthāya eti āgacchatīti īti, upaddavo, iti āgamanattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:29_1: Āha ca suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘etīti īti, āgantukānaṁ akusalabhāgīnaṁ byasanahetūnaṁ
anya-e0804n0:30_0: Idāni yathārahaṁ nipātākhyātanāmikapariyāpannānaṁ itiito saddānamatthuddhāro vuccate
anya-e0804n0:30_1: – tattha itisaddo hetuparisamāpanādipadattha vipariyāya pakārāvadhāraṇa nidassanādianekatthappabhedo.
anya-e0804n0:30_2: Tathā hesa ‘‘ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccatī’’tiādīsu hetuatthe dissati.
anya-e0804n0:30_3: ‘‘Tasmātiha me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
anya-e0804n0:30_4: anukampā, kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ, no āmisadāyādā’’tiādīsu parisamāpane.
anya-e0804n0:30_5: ‘‘Iti vā iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato’’tiādīsu ādiattho. ‘‘Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa
anya-e0804n0:30_6: brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṁ nāmakammaṁ nāmadheyyaṁ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:30_7: padatthavipariyāye. ‘‘Iti kho bhikkhave sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. Saupaddavo
anya-e0804n0:30_8: bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. Saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo paṇḍito’’tiādīsu pakāro. ‘‘Atthi
anya-e0804n0:30_9: idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā ādanda atthītissa vacanīyaṁ. Kiṁ paccayā
anya-e0804n0:30_10: jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya’’ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:30_11: avadhāraṇe. ‘‘Atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto, natthīti kho kaccāna ayaṁ dutiyo
anya-e0804n0:30_12: anto’’tiādīsu nidassane. Nipātavaseneva te payogā gahetabbā. ‘‘Itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:30_13: ettha pana ākhyātavasena gamane itisaddo dissati. Ayamevattho idhādhippeto, nipātattho
anya-e0804n0:30_14: pana na icchitabbo, viññūnaṁ atthaggahaṇe kosallupādanatthaṁ kevalaṁ atthuddhāravasena
anya-e0804n0:35: Gatyattho icchito ettha, itarattho na icchito;
anya-e0804n0:37_0: Idha pana samayasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ sanibbacanaṁ vattabbampi avatvā upari ayadhātuvisayeyeva
anya-e0804n0:37_1: vakkhāma i e ayadhātuvasena tidhātumayattā samayasaddassa. Tatra itīti ikārānantaratyantapadassa
anya-e0804n0:37_2: ca ‘‘eti, udetī’’tiādīnañca ekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ aññesañca evarūpānaṁ padamālā
anya-e0804n0:37_3: yathārahaṁ yebhuyyena attanopadāni vajjetvā yojetabbā. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dukkarā
anya-e0804n0:37_4: kriyāpadamālā. Yasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe sukarā ca dukkarā ca tyantapadamālā jānitabbā
anya-e0804n0:37_5: , tasmā bhūvādigaṇādīsu aṭṭhasu gaṇesu vihitehi channavutiyā vacanehi sabbasādhāraṇaṁ
anya-e0804n0:40: Iti etī’’ti cetesaṁ, padānaṁ pana pantiyo;
anya-e0804n0:53: Ito mutto nayo nāma, natthi koci kriyāpade.
anya-e0804n0:56_0: Idāni ikārānantaratyantapadassa kamo vuccate – iti, inti. Isi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo
anya-e0804n0:56_1: vattamānānayo. Itu, intu. Ihi, itha. Imi, ima. Aparipuṇṇo pañcamīnayo. Ettha ca imesaṁ
anya-e0804n0:56_2: dvinnaṁ sāsanānurūpabhāvassa imāni sādhakapadāni ‘‘veti, apeti, anvetī’’ti. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:56_3: vi iti veti. Vigacchatīti attho, itisaddo hettha gamanaṁ bodheti. Tathā apa iti apeti.
anya-e0804n0:56_4: Apagacchatīti attho. Anu iti anveti. Anugacchatīti attho. Garū pana anu eti anvetīti vadanti. Taṁ –
anya-e0804n0:59: Evaṁ taṁ anugacchāmi, putte ādāya pacchato’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:60_0: Imāya pāḷiyā na sameti ‘‘jessantaṁ anvetī’’ti vacanato ‘‘anugacchāmī’’ti vacanato
anya-e0804n0:60_1: ca. Tathā hi etisaddo yattha ce iriyāpathavācako, tattha āgamanaṁyeva joteti, na
anya-e0804n0:60_2: gamanaṁ, tasmā āgamanatthassa ayuttito gamanatthassa ca yuttito vi itiādinā chedo
anya-e0804n0:60_3: ñeyyo. Etesañca itisaddavasena katachedānaṁ atthibhāvaṁ yuttibhāvañca ‘‘itāyaṁ kodharūpenā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:60_4: pāḷiyeva sādheti, tasmāyeva ‘‘anu iti, anu inti, anu isī’’tiādinā ‘‘anvetī’’tiādīnaṁ
anya-e0804n0:60_5: chede labbhamānanayena vuttappakāro vattamānāpañcamīnayo parassapadavasena dassito.
anya-e0804n0:61_0: Imāni pana bhavissantiyā rūpāni, sittā te lahumessati. Issati, issanti. Issasi, issatha.
anya-e0804n0:61_1: Issāmi, issāma. Issate, issante. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ, issāmhe. Asabbadhātukattepi
anya-e0804n0:61_2: suddhassarattā dhātussa ikārāgamo na labbhati. Paripuṇṇo bhavissantīnayo.
anya-e0804n0:62_0: Atha kālātipattiyā rūpāni bhavanti, issā, issaṁsu. Isse, issatha. Issaṁ, issamhā.
anya-e0804n0:62_1: Issatha, issisu. Issase, issavhe. Issaṁ, issāmhase. Kālātipattibhāve ca asabbadhātukatte
anya-e0804n0:62_2: ca santepi suddhassarattā dhātussa akārikārāgamo na labbhati anekantikattā vā anupapannattā
anya-e0804n0:62_3: ca akārāgamo na hoti. Dvinnañhettha suddhassarānaṁ anantarikānaṁ ekatosannipāto anupapatti.
anya-e0804n0:63_0: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane sotūnaṁ payogatthesu paramakosallajananatthaṁ
anya-e0804n0:63_1: ‘‘nanu te sutaṁ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne, devā na issanti purisaparakkamassā’’ti pāḷito
anya-e0804n0:63_2: nayaṁ gahetvā vuttappakārehi bhavissantiyā rūpehi sabbaso samānāni asamānatthāni
anya-e0804n0:63_3: vattamānikarūpāni ca īsakaṁ aññamaññaṁ samānāni bhavissantīkālātipattīnaṁ rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:63_4: ca pakāsayissāma – vattamānāvasena tāva ‘‘issati, issanti. Issasi, issathā’’ti sabbaṁ
anya-e0804n0:63_5: yojetabbaṁ. Attho pana ‘‘issaṁ karotī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Tasmiṁyeva atthe bhavissantīvasena
anya-e0804n0:63_6: ‘‘ississati, ississanti. Ississasi, ississathā’’ti paripuṇṇaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Attho pana
anya-e0804n0:63_8: Ississe, ississathā’’ti paripuṇṇaṁ yojetabbaṁ, attho pana ‘‘issaṁ akarissā’’tiādinā
anya-e0804n0:65: Eti, enti. Esi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:66: Etu, entu. Ehi, etha. Emi, ema.
anya-e0804n0:67: Na ca appatvā dukkhantaṁ, vissāsaṁ eyya paṇḍito;
anya-e0804n0:69: Yadā te pahiṇissāmi, tadā eyyāsi khattiya.
anya-e0804n0:70: Eyya , eyyuṁ. Eyyāsi, eyyātha. Eyyāmi, eyyāma. Etha, eraṁ. Etho, eyyāvho. Eyyaṁ, eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:71: So puriso eyya, te eyyuṁ. Tvaṁ eyyāsi, tumhe eyyātha. Ahaṁ eyyāmi, mayaṁ eyyāma. So puriso etha, te eraṁ. Tvaṁ etho, tumhe eyyāvho. Ahaṁ eyyaṁ, mayaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:73: Essati, essanti. Essasi, essatha. Essāmi, essāma. Essate, essante. Essase, essavhe. Essaṁ, essāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:75: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:76: ‘‘Abhidosagato idāni ehī’’ti vacanadassanato aparānipi bhavissantīrūpāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:77: Ehiti, ehinti. Ehisi, ehitha. Ehimi, ehima. Ehite, ehinte. Ehise, ehivhe. Ehissaṁ, ehissāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:78: Essā, essaṁsu. Esse, essatha. Essaṁ essāmhā. Essatha, essisu. Essase, essavhe. Essiṁ, essāmhase.
anya-e0804n0:80: Udeti, udenti; Udesi, udetha; Udemi, udema.
anya-e0804n0:81: Udetu, udentu. Udehi, udetha. Udemi, udema, udāmase.
anya-e0804n0:82: Udeyya, udeyyuṁ. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissati, udissanti. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Udissā, udissaṁsu. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:85_0: Kusadde ke ca. Koti, kavati, kāyati, evaṁ kattupadāni bhavanti. Kuyyati, kiyyati,
anya-e0804n0:85_1: evaṁ kammapadāni. Kānanaṁ, kabbaṁ, jātakaṁ, evaṁ nāmikapadāni. Kutvā, kutvāna, kavitvā,
anya-e0804n0:85_2: kavitvāna, kāvitvā, kāvitvāna, kāyituṁ, evaṁ abyayapadāni.
anya-e0804n0:86: Tatra kānananti ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye kavati saddaṁ karotīti kānanaṁ, vanaṁ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:88: Saṇateva brahāraññaṁ, sā rati paṭibhāti ma’’nti
anya-e0804n0:89_0: Vuttaṁ. Atha vā kokilamayūrādayo kavanti saddāyanti kūjanti etthāti kānanaṁ. Manoharatāya
anya-e0804n0:89_1: avassaṁ kuyyati paṇḍitehīti kabbaṁ. Kāviyaṁ. Kāveyyaṁ. Aññatra pana kavīnaṁ idanti
anya-e0804n0:89_2: kabbanti taddhitavasena attho gahetabbo. Keci tu kābyanti saddarūpaṁ icchanti, na
anya-e0804n0:89_3: taṁ pāvacane pamāṇaṁ sakkaṭabhāsābhāvato. Sakkaṭabhāsātopi hi ācariyā nayaṁ gaṇhanti.
anya-e0804n0:89_4: Jātaṁ bhūtaṁ atītaṁ bhagavato cariyaṁ, taṁ kīyati kathīyati etenāti jātakaṁ. Jātakapāḷi
anya-e0804n0:89_5: hi idha ‘‘jātaka’’nti vuttā. Aññatra pana jātaṁ eva jātakanti gahetabbaṁ. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n0:89_6: jātakasaddo desanāyampi vattati ‘‘itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhamma’’ntiādīsu. Jātiyampi
anya-e0804n0:90_0: Pakka nīcagatiyaṁ. Nīcagamanaṁ nāma hīnagamanaṁ hīnappavatti vā. Nīcasaddo hi hīnavācako
anya-e0804n0:90_1: ‘‘nīce kule paccājāto’’ti ettha viya. Pakkati kriyāpadamettha dissati, na nāmikapadaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:90_2: Yattha yattha nāmikapadaṁ na dissati, tattha tattha nāmikapadaṁ upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:90_3: Kriyāpadameva hi duddasaṁ, kriyāpade vijjamāne nāmikapadaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:90_4: tasmā antamaso ‘‘pakkanaṁ, takanaṁ’’ iccevamādīni bhāvavācakāni nāmikapadāni sabbāsu
anya-e0804n0:92_0: Taki kicchajīvane. Kicchajīvanaṁ kasirajīvanaṁ. Taṅkati. Ātaṅkati. Ātaṅko. Ātaṅkoti
anya-e0804n0:92_1: kicchajīvitakaro rogo, tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘appābādhaṁ appātaṅka’’nti imasmiṁ
anya-e0804n0:92_2: pāḷippadese iti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ ‘‘ābādhoti visabhāgavedanā vuccati, yā ekadese
anya-e0804n0:92_3: uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṁ ayapaṭṭena bandhitvā viya gaṇhāti. Ātaṅkoti kicchajīvitakaro
anya-e0804n0:92_4: rogo. Atha vā yāpetabbarogo ātaṅko, itaro ābādho. Khuddako vā rogo ātaṅko, balavā
anya-e0804n0:92_5: ābādho. Keci pana ‘ajjhattasamuṭṭhāno ābādho, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno ātaṅko’ti vadantī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:97: Suka gatiyaṁ. Sokati, suko, sukī. Tatra sukoti suvo. Sokati manāpena gamanena gacchatīti suko. Tassa bhariyā sukī.
anya-e0804n0:98: Bukka bhassane. Idha bhassanaṁ nāma sunakhabhassanaṁ adhippetaṁ ‘‘sunakho bhassitvā’’ti ettha viya, na ‘‘āvāso gocaraṁ bhassa’’ntiādīsu viya. Vacanasaṅkhātaṁ bhassanaṁ, bukkati sā.
anya-e0804n0:99: Dhaka paṭighāte gatiyañca. Paṭighāto paṭihananaṁ. Dhakati.
anya-e0804n0:100: Caka tittipaṭighātesu. Titti tappanaṁ, paṭighātaṁ paṭihananaṁva. Cakati.
anya-e0804n0:101_0: Aka kuṭilagatiyaṁ. Akati. Etā kuādikā akapariyantā dhātuyo parassa bhāsāti saddasatthavidū
anya-e0804n0:101_1: vadanti. Tesaṁ mate etā ‘‘ti anti, tu antu’’ iccādīnaṁyeva visayo. Pāḷiyaṁ pana niyamo
anya-e0804n0:101_2: natthi, tasmā na taṁ idha pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:102_0: I ajjhayane. Ajjhayanaṁ uccāraṇaṁ sikkhanaṁ vā, ayati, adhīyati, ajjhayati, adhīte,
anya-e0804n0:102_1: ajjhenaṁ, ajjhāyako. Dibbaṁ adhīyase māyaṁ. Adhīyanti mahārāja, dibbamāyidha paṇḍitā.
anya-e0804n0:102_2: Ajjhenamariyā pathaviṁ janindā. Tattha ajjhāyakoti ajjhayatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:103: U sadde. Avati, avanti. Avasi. Ettha ‘‘yo ātumānaṁ sayameva pāvā’’ti pāḷi papubbassa udhātussa payogoti daṭṭhabbo. Papubbassa vadadhātussa dakāralopappayogotipi vattuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0804n0:104: Vaṅka koṭille. Vaṅkati. Vaṅkaṁ. Vaṅkasaddo hi vakkasaddena samānattho, vakkasaddo ca vaṅkasaddena. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n0:106: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṁ saraṇato bhaya’’nti.
anya-e0804n0:107_0: Pāḷi dissati. Ayaṁ pana vakkasaddo sakkaṭabhāsaṁ patvā kakārarakārasaññogakkhariko
anya-e0804n0:107_1: bhavati, dhātubhāvo panassa porāṇehi na vutto, tasmā kriyāpadaṁ na diṭṭhaṁ. Imassa
anya-e0804n0:107_2: pana vaṅkasaddassa ‘‘vaṅka koṭille’’ti dhātubhāvo vutto, ‘‘vaṅkatī’’ti kriyāpadañca,
anya-e0804n0:107_3: pāḷiyaṁ tu ‘‘vaṅkatī’’ti kriyāpadaṁ na diṭṭhaṁ, tathā bhāvavācako vaṅkasaddopi. Vāccaliṅgo
anya-e0804n0:107_4: pana anekesu ṭhānesu diṭṭho. Tatta vaṅkatīti kriyāpadaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānampi gahetabbameva
anya-e0804n0:107_5: nāthatīti kriyāpadamiva. Bhāvavācakassa pana vaṅkasaddassa atthitā natthitā ca pāḷiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:107_6: punappunaṁ upaparikkhitabbā. Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yadi bhāvavācako vaṅkasaddo natthi,
anya-e0804n0:107_7: kathaṁ ‘aṭṭhavaṅkaṁ maṇiratanaṁ uḷāra’nti ettha samāso’’ti. Ettha pana aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu
anya-e0804n0:107_8: vaṅkaṁ aṭṭhavaṅkaṁ, na aṭṭhavaṅkāni yassāti. Dabbavācako hi vaṅkasaddo, na bhāvavācakoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:111: Baḷise giribhede ca, vattate sa pumā tadā.
anya-e0804n0:112: Ayañhi ‘‘te’me janā vaṅkaghastā sayanti. Yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ, vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chāditaṁ. Vaṅkaghastova ambujo’’tiādīsu baḷise vattati.
anya-e0804n0:113_0: Ettha siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ, vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’nti ettha
anya-e0804n0:113_1: vaṅkasaddo guṇavācako visesanasado, yena baḷiso visesito, tena vaṅkaṁ kuṭilaṁ baḷisanti
anya-e0804n0:113_2: attho viññāyatī’’ti? Tanna, vaṅkasadde avuttepi baḷisasabhāvassa vaṅkattā kuṭilattho
anya-e0804n0:113_3: pākaṭoti natthi visesanasaddena payojanaṁ. Idaṁ pana ‘‘baḷisaṁ vaṅka’’nti vacanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:113_4: ‘‘hatthi nāgo. Saroruhaṁ padumaṁ. Hatthī ca kuñjaro nāgo’’tiādivacanamiva pariyāyavacanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:113_5: tasmā ‘‘vaṅka’’nti padassa ‘‘kuṭila’’nti attho na gahetabbo. Atha vā yathā ‘‘yathā
anya-e0804n0:113_6: āraññakaṁ nāgaṁ, dantiṁ anveti hatthinī’’ti ettha nāgasaddassa dantīsaddassa ca aññamaññapariyā
anya-e0804n0:113_7: yavacanattepi dantinti manoramadantayuttanti attho saṁvaṇṇito, tathā ‘‘baḷisaṁ vaṅka’’nti
anya-e0804n0:113_8: imesampi aññamaññaṁ pariyāyavacanattepi vaṅkanti kuṭilanti attho vattabbo. Evañhi
anya-e0804n0:113_9: sati attho sālarājā viya suphullito hoti, desanā ca vilāsappattā, na pana ‘‘vaṅkaṁ
anya-e0804n0:113_10: baḷisa’’nti saddānaṁ guṇaguṇīvasena samānādhikaraṇabhāvo icchitabbo ‘‘buddho bhagavā
anya-e0804n0:113_11: verañjāyaṁ viharatī’’tiādīsu ‘‘buddho bhagavā’’ti imesaṁ viya samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa
anya-e0804n0:113_12: anicchitabbattā. Na hi īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo porāṇehi anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_0: ‘‘Buddhaṁ buddhaṁ nikhilavisayaṁ suddhiyā yāva suddhi’’nti ca ādīsu pana anumato.
anya-e0804n0:116_2: ca ‘‘sambuddho’’ti ca ‘‘parinibbuto’’ti ca imāni ‘‘satthā’’ti anena padena samānādhikaraṇāni.
anya-e0804n0:116_3: Tathā ‘‘buddhaṁ buddha’’nti dvinnaṁ padānaṁ pacchimaṁ purimena samānādhikaraṇaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0804n0:117_0: Iti ‘‘yathāpi maccho baḷisaṁ, vaṅkaṁ maṁsena chādita’’nti ettha vaṅkasaddo baḷisassābhidhānantaraṁ,
anya-e0804n0:117_1: na guṇavācako. Evaṁ vaṅkasaddo baḷise vattati. ‘‘Kaṅkaṁ gacchāma pabbataṁ. Dūre vaṅkatapabbato’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:117_2: pana girivisese vattati. Ettha ca ‘‘vaṅkapabbato’’ti vattabbe sukhuccāraṇatthaṁ niruttinayena
anya-e0804n0:117_3: majjhe animittaṁ takārāgamaṁ katvā ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ. Atha vā vaṅkoyeva
anya-e0804n0:117_4: vaṅkatā, yathā devo eva devatā. Yathā ca disā eva disatāti, evaṁ tāpaccayavasena
anya-e0804n0:117_5: vaṅkatā ca sā pabbato cāti ‘‘vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttaṁ, majjhe rassavasena cetaṁ
anya-e0804n0:117_6: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha vā vaṅkamassa saṇṭhānamatthīti vaṅkatoti mantuatthe tapaccayo, yathā
anya-e0804n0:117_7: pabbamassa atthīti pabbatoti. Evaṁ vaṅkato ca so pabbato cāti vaṅkatapabbato. ‘‘Vaṅkapabbato’’
anya-e0804n0:117_8: icceva vā paṇṇatti, pādakkharapāripūriyā pana ‘‘dūre vaṅkatapabbato’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:118_0: Loka dassane. Lokati. Loko. Ālokoti aññānipi rūpāni gahetabbāni. Curādigaṇaṁ pana
anya-e0804n0:118_1: patvā imissā ‘‘loketi, lokayati, oloketi, olokayatī’’tiādinā rūpāni bhavanti. Lokoti
anya-e0804n0:118_2: tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha ‘‘eko loko, sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:118_3: āgato saṅkhāro eva loko saṅkhāraloko. Sattā eva loko sattaloko. Cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto
anya-e0804n0:118_4: okāso eva loko okāsaloko, yo ‘‘bhājanaloko’’tipi vuccati. Tesu saṅkhāro lujjatīti
anya-e0804n0:118_5: lokoti. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhu tasmā lokoti vuccatī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:118_6: Lokiyati ettha puññapāpaṁ tabbipāko cāti satto loko. Lokiyati vicittākārato dissatīti
anya-e0804n0:118_7: cakkavāḷasaṅkhāto okāso loko. Yasmā pana lokasaddo samūhepi dissati, tasmā lokiyati
anya-e0804n0:118_8: samudāyavasena paññāpiyatīti loko, samūhoti ayampi attho gahetabbo. Atha vā lokoti
anya-e0804n0:118_9: tayo lokā kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyalokoti. Tesaṁ sarūpaṁ curādigaṇe kathessāma
anya-e0804n0:118_10: bahuvidhatañca. Bahiddhā pana kavīhi ‘‘loko tu bhuvane jane’’ti ettakameva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:119_0: Siloka saṅghāte. Saṅghāto piṇḍanaṁ. Silokati, siloko, silokamanukassāmi. Akkharapadaniyamito
anya-e0804n0:119_1: vacanasaṅghāto siloko. So pajjanti vuccati, tathā hi ‘‘siloko yasassi pajje’’ti kavayo vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:120: Deka dheka saddussāhesu. Saddo ravo, ussāho vāyāmo. Dekati. Dhekati.
anya-e0804n0:121: Reka saki saṅkāyaṁ. Rekati. Saṅkati, tasmiṁ me saṅkate mano. Saṅkā.
anya-e0804n0:124: Kata loliye. Lolabhāvo loliyaṁ yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Kakati, kāko, kākī. Ettha ‘‘kāko, dhaṅko, vāyaso, bali, bhoji, ariṭṭho’’ti imāni kākābhidhānāni.
anya-e0804n0:125: Kuka vaka ādāne. Kukati, vakati, koko, vako. Ettha kokoti araññasunakho. Vakoti khuddakavanadīpiko, byagghotipi vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:126: Vaka dittiyaṁ paṭighāte ca. Ditti sobhā, vakati.
anya-e0804n0:127_0: Kakivaki sakka tika ṭika seka gatyatthā. Kaṅkati, vaṅkati, sakkati, nisakkati, parisakkati,
anya-e0804n0:127_1: osakkati, vadhāya parisakkanaṁ. Biḷāranisakkamattampi. Tekati, ṭekati, ṭīkā sekati.
anya-e0804n0:127_2: Ettha ṭīkāti ṭikiyati jāniyati saṁvaṇṇanāya attho etāyāti ṭīkā. Etā idhātuādikā sekapariyantā
anya-e0804n0:127_3: dhātuyo ‘‘attanobhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Tesaṁ mate etā ‘‘te ante, taṁ
anya-e0804n0:127_4: antaṁ’’iccādīnaṁyeva visayo, pāvacane pana niyamo natthi.
anya-e0804n0:128_0: Hikka abyattasadde. Abyattasaddo avibhāvitatthasaddo niratthakasaddo ca. Hikkati,
anya-e0804n0:128_1: hikkate. Imaṁ ‘‘ubhayatobhāsā’’ti vadanti. Idaṁ tu pāvacanena saṁsandati. Parassattanobhāsānañhi
anya-e0804n0:128_2: dhātūnaṁ ‘‘bhavati, bhavate, bādhate, bādhatī’’tiādinā yebhuyyena dvidhā dvidhā rūpāni sāsane dissanti.
anya-e0804n0:131_0: Khā pakathane khyā ca. Pakathanaṁ ācikkhanaṁ desanaṁ vā. Khāti, saṅkhāti. Āpubbatte
anya-e0804n0:131_1: visadisabhāvena khātyakkharassa dvittaṁ, ākārassa ca saññogapubbattā rassattaṁ, akkhāti.
anya-e0804n0:131_2: Akkhāsi purisuttamo. Akkheyyaṁ te ahaṁ ayye. Dhammo saṅkhāyati. Akkhāyati. Atra pana
anya-e0804n0:131_3: kakāralopo. Svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo. Saṅkhāto. Akkhāto. Akkhātāro tathāgatā. Saṅkhātā
anya-e0804n0:131_4: sabbadhammānaṁ vidhuro. Saṅkhā, paṭisaṅkhā. Kriyaṁ ākyāti kathetīti ākhyātaṁ. Keci
anya-e0804n0:131_5: pana ‘‘svākhāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākkhyāto’’ti ca ‘‘svākhyāto’’ti ca padamicchanti. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:131_6: pacchimāni sakkaṭabhāsāto nayaṁ gahetvā vuttāni, itaraṁ yathāṭhitarūpanipphattivasena,
anya-e0804n0:131_7: ato yathādassitapadāniyeva pasatthatarāni. Tattha saṅkhāsaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate
anya-e0804n0:131_9: hi ñāṇe dissati. ‘‘Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī’’tiādīsu koṭṭhāse. ‘‘Tesaṁ tesaṁ
anya-e0804n0:131_10: dhammānaṁ saṅkhā samaññā’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṁ. ‘‘Na sukaraṁ saṅkhātu’’ntiādīsu gaṇanāyaṁ. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:134_0: Khi khaye. Khiyanadhammaṁ khīyati. Sāsanānurūpena sare ikārassa iyyādeso, khiyyati.
anya-e0804n0:134_1: ‘‘Khayo, khaṁ’’ iccapi rūpāni ñeyyāni. Tattha khayoti khiyanaṁ khayo. Atha vā khiyanti
anya-e0804n0:134_2: kilesā etthāti khayo, magganibbānāni. Khayasaṅkhātena maggena pāpuṇiyattā phalampi
anya-e0804n0:134_3: khayo. Khanti tucchaṁ suññaṁ vivittaṁ rittaṁ, khanti vā ākāso.
anya-e0804n0:135_0: Khi nivāse. Khīyati, khiyyati vā. Sāsanānurūpena ikārassa īya iyyādeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:135_1: Ayaṁ divādigaṇepi pakkhipitabbo. Khaṁ khayaṁ. Abhiramaṇīyaṁ rājakkhayaṁ. Tattha khīyatīti
anya-e0804n0:135_2: nivasati. Khanti cakkhādiindriyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṁ nivāsaṭṭhena. Khayanti nivesanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:141: Khe khādanasattāsu. Khāyati. Undūrā khāyanti. Vikkhāyitakaṁ. Gokhāyitakaṁ. Assirī viya khāyati. Disāpi me na pakkhāyanti. Etthādimhi kāyatīti khādati. Atha vā upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.
anya-e0804n0:142_0: Sukha dukkha takriyāyaṁ. Takriyāti sukhadukkhānaṁ vedanānaṁ kriyā, sukhanaṁ dukkhananti
anya-e0804n0:142_1: vuttaṁ hoti. Akammakā ime dhātavo. Sukhati, dukkhati. Sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ. Sukhito, dukkhito.
anya-e0804n0:142_2: Sukhaṁ sātaṁ pīṇanaṁ, dukkhaṁ vighātaṁ aghaṁ kileso. Tattha sukhanti sukhayatīti
anya-e0804n0:142_3: sukhaṁ. Yassuppajjati, taṁ sukhitaṁ karotīti attho. Dukkhanti dukkhayatīti dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:142_4: Yassuppajjati, taṁ dukkhitaṁ karotīti attho. Imāni nibbacanāni kāritavasena vuttānīti
anya-e0804n0:142_5: daṭṭhabbaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ sukhadukkhasaddatthaṁ vadantehi garūhi sukhayati dukkhayatisaddānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:142_6: kammatthamādāya vivaraṇassa katattā. Tathā hi ‘‘sukheti sukhayati, sukhāpeti sukhāpayati,
anya-e0804n0:142_7: dukkheti dukkhayati, dukkhāpeti dukkhāpayatī’’ti imāni tesaṁ kāritapadarūpāni, attānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:142_8: sukheti pīṇetīti ca, sukhayati sukhaṁ, dukkhayatīti dukkhanti ca,
anya-e0804n0:147_0: Pāḷiādidassanato. Saddasatthe pana dhātupāṭhasaṅkhepe ca ime dhātavo curādigaṇeyeva
anya-e0804n0:147_1: vuttā. ‘‘Sukhayati dukkhayatī’’ti ca akāritāni suddhakattupadāni icchitāni. Mayaṁ
anya-e0804n0:147_2: tu tesaṁ tabbacanaṁ suddhakattari ca tāni padarūpāni na icchāma pāḷiādīhi viruddhattā,
anya-e0804n0:147_3: tasmāyeva te imasmiṁ bhūvādigaṇe vuttā. Ayañhi suddhakattuvisaye asmākaṁ ruci ‘‘sukhatīti
anya-e0804n0:148_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘sukhati dukkhatī’’ti kriyāpadāni buddhavacane na dissantīti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:148_1: evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathānayavasena gahetabbattā dissantiyeva nāma. Na hi sabbathā
anya-e0804n0:148_2: sabbesaṁ dhātūnaṁ rūpāni sāsane loke vā labbhanti, ekaccāni pana labbhanti, ekaccāni
anya-e0804n0:148_3: na labbhanti. Evaṁ santepi nayavasena labbhantiyeva. ‘‘Kappayavho patissatā’’ti hi
anya-e0804n0:149_0: Tatra panāyaṁ nayo. Visuddhimaggādīsu hi ‘‘ekadviyojanamattampi addhānaṁ gatassa
anya-e0804n0:149_1: vāyo kuppati, gattāni dukkhantī’’ti evaṁ bhūvādigaṇikaṁ akammakaṁ suddhakattuvācakaṁ
anya-e0804n0:149_2: ‘‘dukkhantī’’ti kriyāpadaṁ dissati. Tasmiṁ diṭṭhiyeva ‘‘sukhati, sukhanti. Sukhasi,
anya-e0804n0:149_3: sukhatha. Sukhāmi, sukhāmā’’tiādīni ca ‘‘dukkhati, dukkhanti. Dukkhasi, dukkhathā’’tiādīnica
anya-e0804n0:149_4: diṭṭhāni nāma honti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa tādisassa anavajjassa nayassa gahetabbattā,
anya-e0804n0:149_5: tasmā ‘‘sukhatīti sukhito, dukkhatīti dukkhito’’ti bhūvādinayo eva gahetabbo, na
anya-e0804n0:149_6: pana curādinayo. Aparampettha nibbacanaṁ, sukhaṁ sañjātaṁ etassāti sukhito, sañjātasukhoti
anya-e0804n0:149_7: attho. Esa nayo dukkhitoti etthāpi. Atha vā sukhena ito pavattoti sukhito. Esa nayo
anya-e0804n0:149_8: ‘‘dukkhito’’ti etthāpi. Dullabhāyaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n0:150_0: Mokkha muccane. Akammakoyaṁ dhātu. Mokkhati. Mokkho. Pātimokkho. Kārite ‘‘mokkheti,
anya-e0804n0:150_1: mokkhayati, mokkhāpeti, mokkhāpayatī’’ti rūpāni. Keci panimaṁ ‘‘mokkha mocane’’ti
anya-e0804n0:150_2: paṭhitvā curādigaṇe pakkhipanti. Tesaṁ mate ‘‘mokkheti, mokkhayatī’’ti suddhakattupadāni
anya-e0804n0:150_3: bhavanti. Etāni pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti. Tathā hi ‘‘mokkhanti mārabandhanā.
anya-e0804n0:150_4: Na me samaṇe mokkhasi. Mahāyaññaṁ yajissāma, evaṁ mokkhāma pāpakā’’ti pāḷiyā virujjhanti.
anya-e0804n0:150_5: ‘‘Yo naṁ pāti rakkhati, taṁ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkho’’ti
anya-e0804n0:150_6: aṭṭhakathāya ca virujjhanti, tasmā pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘mokkhesi mokkhemā’’ti ca avatvā ‘‘mokkhasi,
anya-e0804n0:150_7: mokkhāmā’’ti suddhakattuvācakaṁ vuttaṁ, tañca kho apādānavisayaṁ katvā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:150_8: pana ‘‘mokkheti, mocetī’’ti hetukattuvācakaṁ vuttaṁ, tampi apādānavisayaṁyeva katvā.
anya-e0804n0:150_9: Evaṁ imassa dhātuno suddhakattuvisaye akammakabhāvo vidito, hetukattuvisaye ekakammakabhāvo
anya-e0804n0:150_10: vidito muca paca chidādayo viya. Mokkhadhātu dvigaṇikoti ce? Na, anekesu sāṭṭhakathesu
anya-e0804n0:152: Okha rākha lākha dākha dhākha sosanālamatthesu. Okhati. Rākhati. Lākhati. Dākhati. Dhākhati.
anya-e0804n0:154: Ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi gatyatthā. Ukhati. Nakhati. Makhati. Rakhati. Lakhati. Raṅkhati. Laṅkhati. Iṅkhati. Riṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:155: Rakkha pālane. Rakkhati. Rakkhā, rakkhaṇaṁ, sīlaṁ rakkhito devadatto, sīlaṁ rakkhitaṁ devadattena, sīlaṁ rakkhako devadatto.
anya-e0804n0:158_0: Nakkha gatiyaṁ. Nakkhati. Nakkhattaṁ. Ettha nakkhattanti etto ito cāti visamagatiyā
anya-e0804n0:158_1: agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:158_2: Porāṇā pana ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti nakkhattānī’’ti kathayiṁsu. ‘‘Nakkhattaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:163_0: Kakhi vakhi makhi kaṅkhāyaṁ. Satthari kaṅkhati. Vaṅkhati, maṅkhati. ‘‘Kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā
anya-e0804n0:163_1: kaṅkhāyitattaṁ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṁ dvedhāpatho saṁsayo anekaṁsagāho āsappanā
anya-e0804n0:163_2: parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṁ cittassa manovilekho’’ iccete kaṅkhāpariyāyā. Etesu pana –
anya-e0804n0:166: Kakhi iccāyaṁ. Dhanaṁ kaṅkhati, abhikaṅkhati, nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṁ. Abhikaṅkhitaṁ dhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:167: Dakhi dhakhi ghoravāsite kaṅkhāyañca. Daṅkhati. Dhaṅkhati.
anya-e0804n0:170: Jakkha bhakkhaṇe ca. Hasanānukaḍḍhanatthaṁ cakāro. Jakkhati.
anya-e0804n0:171_0: Likha lekhane. Likhati, sallekhati. Atisallekhatevāyaṁ samaṇo. Lekhā, lekhanaṁ, lekhako,
anya-e0804n0:171_1: likhitaṁ, sallekhapaṭipatti, etā dakhiādikā likhapariyantā ‘‘parassabhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:172: Dhukkha dhikkha sandīpanakilesanajīvanesu. Dhukkhati. Dhikkhati. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘dhukkhate dhikkhate’’ti attanobhāsaṁ vadanti. Tathā ito parāni rūpānipi.
anya-e0804n0:173_0: Rukkha vakkha varaṇe. Varaṇaṁ saṁvaraṇaṁ. Rukkhati. Vakkhati. Rukkho, vakkho. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:173_1: ca vakkhoti rukkhoyeva. Tathā hi ‘‘sādūni ramaṇīyāni, santi vakkhā araññajā’’ti jātakapāṭho
anya-e0804n0:175: Ago nago kujo sākhī, sālo ca viṭapī taru;
anya-e0804n0:176: Dumo phalī tu phalavā, gaccho tu khuddapādapo’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:177_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu ca sālasaddena sālarukkhoyeva vutto, nāñño ‘sālā phandanamāluvā’ti
anya-e0804n0:177_1: payogadassanato, atha kimatthaṁ sālasaddena yo koci rukkho vutto’’ti? Na sālarukkhoyeva
anya-e0804n0:177_2: sālasaddena vutto, atha kho sālarukkhepi vanappatijeṭṭharukkhepi yasmiṁ kasmiñci
anya-e0804n0:177_3: rukkhepi ‘‘sālo’’ti vohārassa dassanato aññepi rukkhā vuttā. Tathā hi sālarukkhopi
anya-e0804n0:177_4: ‘‘sālo’’ti vuccati. Yathāha ‘‘seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre
anya-e0804n0:177_5: mahantaṁ sālavanaṁ, tañcassa elaṇḍehi sañchannaṁ. Antarena yamakasālāna’’nti. Vanappatijeṭṭharukkhopi. Yathāha –
anya-e0804n0:180: Yo koci rukkhopi. Yathāha ‘‘atha kho taṁ bhikkhave māluvabījaṁ aññatarasmiṁ sālamūle nipateyyā’’ti. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:185_0: Sikkha vijjopādāne. Sikkhati. Sikkhā, sikkhanaṁ, sikkhitaṁ sippaṁ, sikkhako, sikkhito,
anya-e0804n0:185_1: sekkho, asekkho. Kakāralope ‘‘sekho asekho’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha sikkhitoti
anya-e0804n0:185_2: sañjātasikkho, asikkhīti vā sikkhito, tathā hi kattuppayogo dissati ‘‘ahaṁ kho pana
anya-e0804n0:186_0: Bhikkha yācane. Bhikkhati. Bhikkhu, bhikkhā, bhikkhanaṁ, bhikkhako, bhikkhitaṁ bhojanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:186_1: Ettha pana ‘‘bhikkhu yati samaṇo muni pabbajito anagāro tapassī tapodhano’’ iccetāni
anya-e0804n0:186_2: pariyāyavacanāni. Etesu sāsane ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti upasampanno vuccati. Kadāci pana ‘‘bhikkhusataṁ
anya-e0804n0:186_4: pavattati, tāpasāpi ca samaṇasaddādīhi vuccanti, ‘‘ahū atītamaddhāne, samaṇo khantidīpano’’tiādi ettha nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:187_0: Dakkha vuddhiyaṁ sīghatte ca. Dakkhati, dakkhiṇā, dakkho. Dakkhanti vaddhanti sattā
anya-e0804n0:187_1: etāya yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti dakkhiṇā, dātabbavatthu.
anya-e0804n0:187_2: Dakkhati kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce adandhatāya sīghaṁ gacchatīti dakkho,
anya-e0804n0:188_0: Dikkha muṇḍiopanayananiyamabbatādesesu. Dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye, upanayane, niyame, vate,
anya-e0804n0:188_1: ādese ca pavattati. Dikkhati. Dikkhito muṇḍo. Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho sarabhaṅgajātake
anya-e0804n0:188_2: ‘‘gandho isīnaṁ ciradikkhitānaṁ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’ti etasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi
anya-e0804n0:188_4: vuttaṁ. Evaṁ sante kasmā idha ‘‘dikkhadhātu muṇḍiye vuttā’’ti? Saccaṁ, tattha pana
anya-e0804n0:188_5: dikkhitasaddassa pabbajite vattanato ‘‘cirapabbajitāna’’nti vuttaṁ, na dhātuatthassa
anya-e0804n0:188_6: vibhāvanatthaṁ. Ida pana dhātuatthavibhāvanatthaṁ muṇḍiye vuttā. Tāpasā hi muṇḍiyatthavācakena
anya-e0804n0:188_7: dikkhitasaddena vattuṁ yuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi cakkavattisuttatthavaṇṇanāyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:188_8: ‘‘kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā’’ti imissā pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇe
anya-e0804n0:188_9: ‘‘tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṁ kesamassuṁ ohārenti, tato paṭṭhāya parūḷhakese
anya-e0804n0:188_10: bandhitvā vivaranti, tena vuttaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā’’ti evaṁ attho saṁvaṇṇito.
anya-e0804n0:189: Ikkha dassanaṅkesu. Ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati. Upekkhā, apekkhā, paccavekkhaṇā. Kakāralope ‘‘upekhā, apekhā, upasampadāpekho’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:191_0: Cikkha cakkha viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Cikkhati, ācikkhati, abbhācikkhati. Ācikkhako.
anya-e0804n0:191_1: Cakkhati, cakkhu. Ettha cakkhūti cakkhatīti cakkhu, samavisamaṁ abhibyattaṁ vadantaṁ
anya-e0804n0:191_2: viya hotīti attho. Atha vā ‘‘sūpaṁ cakkhati, madhuṁ cakkhatī’’tiādīsu viya yasmā
anya-e0804n0:191_3: assādatthopi cakkhusaddo bhavati, tasmā ‘‘cakkhati viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ assādentaṁ
anya-e0804n0:191_4: viya hotī’’ti assādatthopi gahetabbo. ‘‘Cakkhuṁ kho māgaṇḍiyaṁ rūpārāmaṁ rūparataṁ
anya-e0804n0:191_5: rūpasammudita’’nti hi vuttaṁ. Satipi sotādīnaṁ saddārāmatādibhāve nirūḷhattā nayane
anya-e0804n0:191_6: eva cakkhusaddo pavattati paṅkajādisaddā viya padumādīsu.
anya-e0804n0:197: Gu karīsussagge. Karīsussaggo vaccakaraṇaṁ. Gavati. Ge sadde. Gāyati. Gītaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:198_0: Vagga gatiyaṁ. Vaggati. Vaggo, vaggitaṁ. Ettha samudāyavasena vagganaṁ pavattanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:198_1: vaggo. Vaggitanti gamanaṁ. Tathā hi nāgapetavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘yo so majjhe assatarīrathena
anya-e0804n0:198_2: catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena. Amhākaṁ putto ahu majjhimo so, amaccharī dānapatī virocatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:198_3: imissā pāḷiyā atthaṁ vadantehi ‘‘suvaggitenāti sundaragamanenā’’ti. Kiñci bhiyyo
anya-e0804n0:198_4: kriyāpadampi ca diṭṭhaṁ ‘‘dhunanti vagganti pavattanti cambare’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:199_0: Ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi gamane ca. Cakāro gatipekkhako. Raṅgati.
anya-e0804n0:199_1: Raṅgo. Laṅgati. Laṅgo, laṅgī. Aṅgati, aṅgeti. Aṅgo, samaṅgī, samaṅgitā, aṅgaṁ, aṅgaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:199_2: Vaṅgati. Vaṅgo. Maṅgati. Maṅgo, upaṅgo, maṅgalaṁ. Iṅgati. Iṅgitaṁ. Riṅgati. Riṅganaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:199_3: Liṅgati. Liṅganaṁ. Ulliṅgati, ulliṅganaṁ. Taṅgati. Taṅganaṁ. Saṅgati. Saṅganaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0804n0:199_4: aṅganti yesaṁ kesañci vatthūnaṁ avayavo, sarīrampi kāraṇampi ca vuccati. Aṅgaṇanti
anya-e0804n0:199_5: katthaci kilesā vuccanti ‘‘rāgo aṅgaṇa’’ntiādīsu. Rāgādayo hi aṅganti etehi taṁsamaṅgipuggalā
anya-e0804n0:199_6: nihīnabhāvaṁ gacchantīti ‘‘aṅgaṇānī’’ti vuccanti. Katthaci malaṁ vā paṅko vā ‘‘tasseva
anya-e0804n0:199_7: rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’tiādīsu. Añjati makkhetīti hi aṅgaṇaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:199_9: Añjati tattha ṭhitaṁ atisundaratāya abhibyañjetīti hi aṅgaṇaṁ, vivaṭo bhūmippadeso. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n0:204: Laga saṅgeca. Ca kāro anantaravuttāpekkhako. Lagati. Ca jato na hoti laganaṁ. Baḷise laggo.
anya-e0804n0:206: Agga kuṭilagatiyaṁ. Aggatīti aggi, kuṭilaṁ gacchatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:207: Aggi dhūmasikho joti, jātavedo sikhī gini;
anya-e0804n0:214: Gu uggame. Uggamo uggamanaṁ pākaṭatā. Gavati. Saddasatthavidū panimāsaṁ ‘‘gāte gavate’’ti attanobhāsattaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:217: Ghā gandhopādāne. Ghāti. Ghānaṁ. Gandhaṁ ghatvā. Atrāyaṁ pāḷi ‘‘gandhaṁ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā’’ti. Etissā pana divādigaṇaṁ pattāya ‘‘ghāyati ghāyitvā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:219: Jaggha hasane. Jagghati, sañjagghati. Sañjagghittho mayā saha. Jagghitumpi na sobhati. Jagghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:221: Sighi āghāne. Āghānaṁ ghānena gandhānubhavanaṁ. Siṅghati, upasiṅghati. Upasiṅghitvā. Ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṁ. Etā ‘‘parassabhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:223: Raghi laghi gatyakkhepe. Gatyakkhepo gatiyā akkhepo. Raṅghati, laṅghati, ullaṅghati. Laṅghitā, ullaṅghikāpīti, laṅghitvā.
anya-e0804n0:224: Maghi ketave ca. Cakāro pubbatthāpekkho. Maṅghati.
anya-e0804n0:226: Dāgha āyāse ca. Āyāso kilamanaṁ. Cakāro sāmatthiyāpekkhako. Dāghati. Nidāgho.
anya-e0804n0:227: Silāgha katthane. Katthanaṁ pasaṁsanaṁ. Silāghati. Silāghā. Buddhassa silāghate. Silāghitvā. ‘‘Attanobhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:233: Suca soke. Socati. Soko, socanā, socaṁ, socanto, socantī, socantaṁ kulaṁ, socitvā.
anya-e0804n0:234: Kuca sadde tāre. Tārasaddo accuccasaddo. Kocati. Uccasaddaṁ karotīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:235: Kuñca koṭilla’ppībhāvesu. Kuñcati. Kuñcikā, kuñcitakeso. Kuñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:236: Luñca apanayane. Luñcati. Luñcako, luñcituṁ, luñcitvā.
anya-e0804n0:237: Añcu gatipūjanāsu. Maggaṁ añcati. Buddhaṁ añcati. Uddhaṁ anuggantvā tiriyaṁ añcitoti tiracchāno. Kaṭukañcukatā.
anya-e0804n0:238: Vañcu cañcu tañcu gatiyaṁ. Vañcati. Cañcati. Tañcati. Mañcati. Santi pādā avañcanā. Avañcanāti vañcituṁ gantuṁ asamatthā.
anya-e0804n0:239: Gucu gaṇecu theyyakaraṇe. Thenanaṁ theyyaṁ, corikā. Tassa kriyā theyyakaraṇaṁ. Gocati. Gaṇecati.
anya-e0804n0:244: Taca saṁvaraṇe. Saṁvaraṇaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Tacati. Taco.
anya-e0804n0:248_0: Vaca viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Viyattassa esā viyatti, tissaṁ viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, viyattāyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:248_1: vācāyanti adhippāyo. Viyattassa hi vadato puggalassa vasena vācā viyattā nāma vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:248_2: Yathā pana kucchisaddatiracchānagatādisaddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati, na evaṁ vacanasaṅkhāto
anya-e0804n0:248_3: saddo ‘‘abyattasaddo’’ti vuccati viññātatthattā. ‘‘Vatti, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi’’
anya-e0804n0:248_5: dhīro, paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Vuccanti. Santo sappurisā loke, devadhammāti vuccare’’
anya-e0804n0:248_6: iccādīni kammapadāni. Garū pana vakārassa ukārādesavasena ‘‘uttaṁ uccate uccante’’tiādīni
anya-e0804n0:248_7: icchanti, tāni sāsane appasiddhāni, sakkaṭabhāsānulomāni. Sāsanasmiñhi rakārāgamavisaye
anya-e0804n0:248_8: nipubbasseva vacassa vassa ukārādeso siddho ‘‘nirutti, niruttaṁ, nerutta’’nti. Vacanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:248_9: vācā, vaco, vacī, vuttaṁ, pavuttaṁ, vuccamānaṁ, adhivacanaṁ, vattabbaṁ, vacanīyaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:248_10: imāni nāmikapadāni. Vattuṁ, vattave, vatvā, vatvāna, imāni tumantādīni ‘‘parassabhāsā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:249_0: Tattha vattīti vadati. Ākhyātapadañhetaṁ. Atthasaṁvaṇṇakehipi ‘‘vatti etāyāti vācā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:249_1: nibbacanamudāhaṭaṁ. Saddasatthe ca tādisaṁ ākhyātapadaṁ diṭṭhaṁ. Ettha paneke vadanti
anya-e0804n0:249_2: ‘‘vacati, vacantītiādīni kriyāpadarūpāni buddhavacane aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu satthesu ca
anya-e0804n0:249_3: anāgatattā chaḍḍetabbānī’’ti. Tanna, yasmā sāsane ‘‘avaca, avaciṁsū’’ti suddhakattupadāni
anya-e0804n0:249_4: ca ‘‘vāceti, vācentī’’tiādīni hetukattupadāni ca dissanti, tasmā buddhavacanādīsu
anya-e0804n0:249_5: anāgatānipi ‘‘vacati, vacantī’’tiādīni rūpāni gahetabbāni. Vaceyya, vuccatu, vucceyya.
anya-e0804n0:250: Parokkhārūpāni vadāma – vaca, vacu. Vace, vacittha. Vacaṁ, vacimha. Vacittha, vacire. Vacittho, vacivho. Vaciṁ, vacimhe.
anya-e0804n0:251: Hiyyattanīrūpāni vadāma – avacā, avacū. Avaco, avacuttha. Avocaṁ, avacumha. Avacuttha, avacutthuṁ. Avacase, avacuvhaṁ. Avaciṁ, avacamhase.
anya-e0804n0:252: Ajjatanīrūpāni vadāma – avaci, avocuṁ, avaciṁsu. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṁ, avocumha. Avocā, avocu. Avacase, avocivaṁ. Avocaṁ, avocimhe.
anya-e0804n0:253: Bhavissantīrūpāni vadāma – vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma. Vakkhate, vakkhante. Vakkhase, vakkhavhe. Vakkhassaṁ vakkhamhe.
anya-e0804n0:254_0: Imesaṁ pana padānaṁ ‘‘kathessati, kathessantī’’tiādinā attho vattabbo. Vakkha roseti
anya-e0804n0:254_1: dhātussa ca ‘‘vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasī’’tiādīni vatvā avasāne uttamapurisekavacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n0:254_2: ‘‘vakkhemī’’ti vattabbaṁ. Attho panimesaṁ ‘‘rosati, rosantī’’tiādinā vattabbo. Ayaṁ
anya-e0804n0:254_4: bhavissantī sahitāni rūpāni bhavanti – vakkhissati, vakkhissanti. Vakkhissasi, vakkhissatha.
anya-e0804n0:254_5: Vakkhissāmi, vakkhissāma. Vakkhissate, vakkhissante. Vakkhissase, vakkhissavhe. Vakkhissaṁ, vakkhissāmhe.
anya-e0804n0:257: Imamhi kappe caritaṁ, pavakkhissaṁ suṇohi me’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:258_0: Gadratapañhepi ‘‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṁ paṭisanthāraṁ katvā gahapati patirūpaṁ āsanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:258_1: ñatvā nisīdathāti vakkhissatī’’ti evamādiaṭṭhakathāpāṭho dissati, tasmāyeva edisī
anya-e0804n0:258_2: padamālā racitā. Vakkha roseti dhātussapi bhavissantīsahitāni rūpāni ‘‘vakkhissati,
anya-e0804n0:259: Avacissā, vacissā, avacissaṁsu, vacissaṁsu. Sesaṁ sabbaṁ neyyaṁ. Idha pana vuttasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vattabbampi avatvā upariyeva kathessāma ito ativiya vattabbaṭṭhānattā.
anya-e0804n0:260: Cu cavane. Cavati. Kārite ‘‘cāvetī’’ti rūpaṁ. Devakāyā cuto. Cutaṁ padumaṁ. Cavituṁ, cavitvā.
anya-e0804n0:265_0: Maca muci kakkane. Kakkanaṁ sarīre ubbaṭṭanaṁ. Macati. Muñcati. Maci dhāraṇucchāyapūjanesu.
anya-e0804n0:265_1: Dhāraṇaṁ ucchāyo pūjananti tayo atthā. Tattha ucchāyo malaharaṇaṁ. Mañcati. Mañco,
anya-e0804n0:266: Paca byattikaraṇe. Pacati. Pāko, paripāko, vipāko, pakkaṁ phalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:269_0: Rucadittiyaṁ rocane ca. Ditti sobhā. Rocanaṁ ruci. Rocati. Verocano. Samaṇassa rocate
anya-e0804n0:269_1: saccaṁ. Tassa te saggakāmassa, ekattamuparocitaṁ. Ayañca divādigaṇe ruciatthaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0804n0:269_2: ‘‘ruccatī’’ti rūpaṁ janeti. Tena ‘‘gamanaṁ mayha ruccatī’’ti pāḷi dissati. Curādigaṇe
anya-e0804n0:269_3: pana ruciatthaṁ gahetvā ‘‘roceti rocayatī’’ti rūpāni janeti. Tena ‘‘kiṁ nu jātiṁ
anya-e0804n0:269_4: na rocesī’’tiādikā pāḷiyo dissanti. Tegaṇikoyaṁ dhātu.
anya-e0804n0:270: Paca saṁpāke. Pacati, pacanti. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘attanobhāsā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:272_0: Yāca yācanāyaṁ. Brāhmaṇo nāgaṁ maṇiṁ yācati. Nāgo maṇiṁ yācito brāhmaṇena. Te taṁ
anya-e0804n0:272_1: asse ayācisuṁ. So taṁ rathamayācatha. Devadattaṁ āyācati. Evaṁ suddhakattari rūpāni
anya-e0804n0:272_2: bhavanti. Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇena nāgaṁ maṇiṁ yāceti, yācayati, yācāpeti, yācāpayati.
anya-e0804n0:272_3: Evaṁ hetukattari. Rājā brāhmaṇena dhanaṁ yāciyati, yācayiyati, yācāpiyati, yācāpayiyati.
anya-e0804n0:272_4: Evaṁ kammani. Yācaṁ, yācanto, yācantī, yācantaṁ kulaṁ. Yācamāno, yācamānā, yācamānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:272_5: kulaṁ. Yācako, yācanā, yācitabbaṁ, yācituṁ, yācitvāna, yācituna, yāciya, yāciyāna.
anya-e0804n0:273_0: Paca pāke. Odanaṁ pacati. ‘‘Ubhayatobhāsā’’ti saddasatthavidū vadanti. Yathā pana
anya-e0804n0:273_1: sāsane ‘‘paṇḍitoti pavuccatī’’ti vacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ pasiddhaṁ, na tathā pacadhātussa.
anya-e0804n0:273_2: Evaṁ santepi garū ‘‘tayā paccate odano’’ti tassa kammani rūpaṁ vadanti. Sāsane pana
anya-e0804n0:273_3: avisesato ‘‘paccate’’ti vā ‘‘paccatī’’ti vā vuttassapi padassa akammakoyeva divādigaṇiko
anya-e0804n0:273_4: payogo icchitabbo ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati. Yāva pāpaṁ na paccatī’’tiādidassanato.
anya-e0804n0:273_5: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīyantiādi viya bhūvādigaṇapakkhiko kammakattuppayogo
anya-e0804n0:273_6: esa, tasmā ‘sayamevā’ti padaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘sayameva devadatto paccatī’tiādinā attho
anya-e0804n0:273_7: vattabbo’’ti tanna, ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti ettha hi pānīyaṁ manussā pivanti,
anya-e0804n0:273_8: na pānīyaṁ pānīyaṁ pivati. Manusseheva taṁ pīyate, na sayaṁ. Evaṁ parassa pānakriyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:273_9: paṭicca kammabhūtampi taṁ sukarapānakriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhantaṁ viya
anya-e0804n0:273_10: hotīti ‘‘sayameva pīyate pānīya’’nti rūḷhiyā payogo kato.
anya-e0804n0:274_0: ‘‘Sayameva kaṭo kariyate’’ti etthāpi kaṭaṁ manussā karonti, na kaṭaṁ kaṭo karoti.
anya-e0804n0:274_1: Manusseheva kaṭo kariyate, na sayaṁ. Evaṁ parassa karaṇakriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi
anya-e0804n0:274_2: so sukaraṇa kriyāvasena sukarattā attanāva sijjhanto viya hotīti ‘‘sayameva kaṭo
anya-e0804n0:275_0: Ettha yathā sayaṁsaddo pānīyaṁ pānīyeneva pīyate, na amhehi. Kaṭo kaṭeneva kariyate,
anya-e0804n0:275_1: na amhehīti sakammakavisayattā payogānaṁ aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanasaṅkhātaṁ atthavisesaṁ
anya-e0804n0:275_2: vadati, na tathā ‘‘devadatto niraye paccati, kammaṁ paccatī’’tiādīsu tumhehi ajjhāharito
anya-e0804n0:275_3: sayaṁsaddo atthavisesaṁ vadati akammakavisayattā etesaṁ payogānaṁ. Evaṁ ‘‘devadatto’’tiādikassa
anya-e0804n0:275_5: idaṁ divādigaṇikarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Pacadhātu saddasatthe divādigaṇa vutto natthīti
anya-e0804n0:275_6: ce? Natthi vā atthi vā, kimettha saddasatthaṁ karissati, pāḷi eva pamāṇaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0804n0:275_7: mayaṁ lokavohārakusalassa bhagavato pāḷinayaññeva gahetvā imaṁ pacadhātuṁ divādigaṇepi
anya-e0804n0:275_8: pakkhipissāma. Tathā hi dhammapālācariya anuruddhācariyādīhi abhisaṅkhatā divādigaṇikappayogā dissanti –-
anya-e0804n0:277: Pacchā paccati pākānaṁ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
anya-e0804n0:279_0: Iccevamādayo. Ettha pana tesaṁ idameva pāḷiyā na sameti. Ye curādigaṇamhi sakammakabhāvena
anya-e0804n0:279_1: bhūvādigaṇe ca akammakabhāvena pavattassa bhūdhātusseva bhūvādigaṇe pavattassa sakamakassapi
anya-e0804n0:279_2: sato divādigaṇaṁ patvā akammakabhūtassa pacadhātussa sakammakattamicchanti. Etañhi
anya-e0804n0:279_3: sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā, tasmā bhagavato pāvacane sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭatthaṁ
anya-e0804n0:282_0: Puriso odanaṁ pacati. Sa bhūtapacaniṁ paci. Odano paccati. Kammaṁ paccati. Vīhisīsaṁ
anya-e0804n0:282_1: paccati. Rukkhaphalāni paccanti. Nāgo pākāraṁ bhindati. Taḷākapāḷi bhijjati. Bhijjanadhammaṁ
anya-e0804n0:282_2: bhijjati. Ettha ca sayaṁsaddaṁ ajjhāharitvā ‘‘sayameva odano paccatī’’tiādinā vuttepi
anya-e0804n0:282_3: ‘‘puriso sayameva pāṇaṁ hanati. Bhagavā sayameva ñeyyadhammaṁ abujjhī’’ti payogesu
anya-e0804n0:282_5: ca aññassa kriyāpaṭisedhanavasena vuttattā yo sayaṁsaddavasena kammakattubhāvaparikappo,
anya-e0804n0:282_6: taṁ na pamāṇaṁ. Sayaṁsaddo hi suddhakattuatthepi dissati, na kevalaṁ ‘‘sayameva pīyate
anya-e0804n0:282_7: pānīya’’ntiādīsu kammattheyeva, tasmā sāsanānurūpena attho gahetabbo nayaññūhi.
anya-e0804n0:285: Kāmaguṇehi dibbati. Paccāmitte dibbati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:287: Payogato sakammā ca, akammā ca gamādayo.
anya-e0804n0:288: Puriso maggaṁ gacchati. Gambhīresupi atthesu ñāṇaṁ gacchati. Dhammaṁ carati. Tattha tattha carati.
anya-e0804n0:291: Pāsādaṁ passati, pāsādaṁ dakkhati pāsādo dissati. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:294: Mataṁ vā amma rodanti, idha nandati pecca nandati.
anya-e0804n0:299: Puriso gāmā niggacchati, dhanaṁ adhigacchati, puriso pāṇaṁ abhibhavati, himavatā pabhavanti mahānadiyo. Aññānipi payogāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n0:300_0: Tattha yadi sāsane pacadhātussa kammani rūpaṁ siyā, ‘‘purisena kammaṁ kariyatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:300_1: payogo viya ‘‘purisena odano paciyatī’’ti payogo icchitabbo. Ye pana garū ‘‘tayā
anya-e0804n0:300_2: paccate odano’’tiādīni icchanti, te saddasatthanayaṁ nissāya vadanti maññe. Evaṁ
anya-e0804n0:300_3: santepi upaparikkhitvā yuttāni ce, gahetabbāni. Kārite ‘‘puriso purisena purisaṁ
anya-e0804n0:300_4: vā odanaṁ pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Purisena puriso odanaṁ pāciyati,
anya-e0804n0:300_5: pācayiyati, pācāpiyati, pācāpayiyatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. ‘‘Yathā daṇḍena gopālo,
anya-e0804n0:300_6: gāvaṁ pāceti gocara’’ntiādīsu aññopi attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0804n0:301_0: Pacaṁ, pacanto, pacantī, pacamāno, pacamānā. Pātabbaṁ, pacitaṁ, pacitabbaṁ, pacanīyaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:301_1: pacituṁ, pacitvā. Ettha ca ‘‘imassa maṁsañca pātabba’’nti payogo udāharaṇaṁ. ‘‘Pacati,
anya-e0804n0:306: Paraṁ na byākarissaṁ so, sāsane īrito na hi.
anya-e0804n0:307: Chuchedane. Choti. Chotvāna moḷiṁ varagandhavāsitaṁ. Acchocchuṁvata bho rukkhaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:308: Milecha aviyattāyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Milecchati, milakkhu. Paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti milakkhūsu aviññātāresu.
anya-e0804n0:310: Achi āyāme. Añcati. Dīghaṁ vā añchanto dīghaṁ añchāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0804n0:312: Muccha mohamucchāsu. Mucchati. Mucchito visavegena, visaññī samapajjatha. Mucchā, mucchitvā.
anya-e0804n0:315: Uchi uñche. Uñcho pariyesanaṁ. Uñchati. Uñchācariyāya īhatha.
anya-e0804n0:317_0: Puccha pañhe pucchati. Pucchitā, pucchako, puṭṭho, pucchito, pucchā. Bhikkhu vinayadharaṁ
anya-e0804n0:317_1: pañhaṁ pucchati. Pucchi, pucchituṁ. Pucchitvā. Ettha ca pañcavidhā pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā
anya-e0804n0:319: Vacchuchedane. Vucchati. Vuttā, vuttavā, vuttasiro. Vakāragatassa akārassa uttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:320_0: Vuttasaddo kesoharaṇepi dissati ‘‘kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro’’tiādīsu. Ettha
anya-e0804n0:320_1: ca sirasaddena siroruhā vuttā yathā mañcasaddena mañcaṭṭhā, cakkhusaddena ca cakkhunissitaṁ
anya-e0804n0:320_2: viññāṇaṁ. Ropitepi ‘‘yathā sāradikaṁ bījaṁ, khette vuttaṁ virūhatī’’tiādīsu. Kathitepi
anya-e0804n0:322: Kesohāre ropite ca, kathite ca yathākkamanti.
anya-e0804n0:323_0: Aparo nayo – vuttasaddo ‘‘no ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati. ‘‘Pannalomo
anya-e0804n0:323_2: ‘‘Gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanavasena pavattite. Loke pana ‘‘vutto pārāyano’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:327_0: Aparopi nayo – vuttasaddo saupasaggoca anupasaggo ca vapane vāpasamīkaraṇe kesohāre
anya-e0804n0:327_1: jīvitavuttiyaṁ pamuttabhāve pāvacanavasena pavattite ajjhene kathaneti evamādīsu
anya-e0804n0:329: Vuttānaṁ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:330_0: Ādīsu vapane āgato. ‘‘No ca kho paṭivutta’’ntiādīsu aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe.
anya-e0804n0:330_2: migabhūtena cetasā viharatī’’tiādīsu jīvitavuttiyaṁ. ‘‘Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso
anya-e0804n0:330_3: bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā’’tiādīsu bandhanato pamuttabhāve. ‘‘Yesamidaṁ
anya-e0804n0:330_4: etarahi porāṇaṁ mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samīhita’’ntiādīsu pāvacanabhāvena pavattite.
anya-e0804n0:330_5: Loke pana ‘‘vutto gaṇo, vutto pārāyano’’tiādīsu ajjhene. ‘‘Vuttaṁ kho panetaṁ bhagavatā,
anya-e0804n0:330_6: dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā’’tiādīsu kathane. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n0:335: Pavattite ca ajjhene, kathane cāti lakkhaye;
anya-e0804n0:339_0: Jijaye. Jeti. Jayati, parājayati. Dhammaṁ caranto sāmikaṁ parājeti. Dhammaṁ caranto
anya-e0804n0:339_1: parajjati. Rājānaṁ jayāpesuṁ. Jayāpetvā. Ettha jayāpesunti ‘‘jayatu bhava’’nti āsīsavacanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:339_2: vadiṁsūti attho. Jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, jayo, vijitaṁ, jino, jetā, jeto, jito māro, māraṁ
anya-e0804n0:339_3: jito, jitavā, jitāvī, vijitāvī, māraji, lokaji, odhijino, anodhijino, jito. Vijito,
anya-e0804n0:339_4: jetuṁ, vijetuṁ, jitvā, vijitvā. Imassa pana dhātussa kiyādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘jināti
anya-e0804n0:340_0: Ji abhibhavane. Jeti. Jino. Pubbe viya rūpāni. Ettha ca ‘‘tumhehi ānanda sappurisehi
anya-e0804n0:340_1: vijitaṁ, pacchimā janatāsālimaṁsodanaṁ atimaññissatī’’ti pāḷi abhibhavanatthasādhakā.
anya-e0804n0:341: Ju gatiyaṁ. Ettha sīghagati adhippetā. Javati. Javanaṁ, javo, javaṁ, javanto, javanacittaṁ, javanapañño, javanahaṁso. Manojavaṁ gacchati yenakāmaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:342: Jekhaye. Jīyati. Ekārassa īyādeso. Sāsanānurūpena ‘‘kiṁ maṁ dhanena jīyethā’’ti hi pāḷi dissati. Saddasatthavidū pana ‘‘jāyatī’’ti rūpaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0804n0:345: Vaja gatiyaṁ. Dhaja dhaji ca. Vajati. Abbajati. Manussattañca abbaje. Vajo, vajanaṁ, pavajanaṁ, pabbajjā, pabbajito, pabbājito.
anya-e0804n0:346: Sakā raṭṭhā pabbājito, aññaṁ janapadaṁ gato;
anya-e0804n0:348: Dhajati. Dhajo. Dhañjati. Dhañjanaṁ. Ettha dhajoti ketu. Dhañjananti gamanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:349_0: Aja khepane ca. Gatiapekkhakoyeva cakāro. Ajati. Ajo. Ettha ajoti eḷako. Imāni panassa
anya-e0804n0:349_1: pariyāyavacanāni ‘‘ajo eḷako urabbho avi meṇḍo’’ti. Tattha urabbhoti eḷako, yo ‘‘ajo’’tipi
anya-e0804n0:349_2: vuccati. Avīti rattalomo eḷako. Meṇḍoti kuṭilasiṅgo eḷako. Tathā hi janakajātake
anya-e0804n0:349_3: ajarathato meṇḍarathā visuṁ vuttā. Apica ajeḷakanti ajato eḷakassa visuṁ vacanato
anya-e0804n0:349_4: eḷakasaddena meṇḍopi gahetabbo, mahosadhajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi meṇḍeḷakānaṁ nibbisesatā vuttāti.
anya-e0804n0:350: Ajja sajja ajjane. Ajjanaṁ ajjanakriyā. Ajjati. Sajjati.
anya-e0804n0:352: Khajja majjane ca. Majjanaṁ suddhi. Byathanāpekkho cakāro. Khajjati. Khajjūro.
anya-e0804n0:354: Khaji gativekalle. Kissa bhante ayyo khañjatīti. Ubho khañjā. Khañjanaṁ, khañjituṁ, khañjitvā.
anya-e0804n0:355: Khaja kampane. Khajati. Ejā. Ettha ca ejāti lābhādiṁ paṭicca ejati kampatīti ejā, balavataṇhāyetaṁ nāmaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:356: Buja vajiranibbese. Vajiranigghoseti keci vidū vadanti. Bojati.
anya-e0804n0:357: Khijakuji guji abyattasadde. Khijati. Kuñjati. Guñjati.
anya-e0804n0:358: Laja lāja tajja bhassane. Lajati. Lājati. Tajjati.
anya-e0804n0:359: Laji dittiyañca. Bhassanāpekkho cakāro. Lañjati. Tatiyo nayalañjako. Lañjeti pakāseti suttatthanti lañjako.
anya-e0804n0:360: Jaja jaji yuddhe. Yujjhanaṁ yuddhaṁ. Jajati. Jañjati.
anya-e0804n0:362: Tuji balane ca. Balanaṁ balanakriyā. Hiṁsāpekkhako cakāro. Tuñjati.
anya-e0804n0:363_0: Gaja kuji muji gajja saddatthā. Gajati. Kuñjati. Muñjati. Gajo gajjati, megho gajjati.
anya-e0804n0:363_1: Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjati. Maṇi gajjati. Ñāṇagajjanaṁ gajjati.
anya-e0804n0:363_2: Gajjituṁ samattho. Gajjitā. Gajjitvā. Tattha gajoti hatthī. Hatthissa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:364: Hatthī nāgo gajo dantī, kuñjaro vāraṇo karī;
anya-e0804n0:366: Thambho rammo dvipo ceva, hatthinī tu kareṇukā;
anya-e0804n0:367: Hatthipoto hatthicchāpo, bhiṅko ca kalabho bhave.
anya-e0804n0:368: Caja cāge. Cajati. Pariccajati. Cāgo. Pariccāgo. Cajanaṁ. Cajaṁ, cajanto. Cajamāno.
anya-e0804n0:369: Sanja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sañcati. Satto. Sajanaṁ, satti. Āsatti. Sajituṁ. Sajitvā.
anya-e0804n0:371: Bhaji bhajjane. Bhajjanaṁ tāpakaraṇaṁ. Tilāni bhajjati. Purisena bhajjamānāni tilāni.
anya-e0804n0:372: Ejabheja bhāja dittiyaṁ. Ditti sobhā. Ejati. Bhejati. Bhājati.
anya-e0804n0:373_0: Tija nisāne, khamāyañca. Nisānaṁ tikkhatākaraṇaṁ. Khamā khanti. Tejati. Titikkhati.
anya-e0804n0:373_1: Tejano. Tejo. Tattha tejanoti kaṇḍo saro usu. Tejoti sūriyo. Atha vā tejoti tejanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:373_2: usmā uṇhattaṁ tāpo. Tejoti vā ānubhāvo pabhāvo.
anya-e0804n0:376: Rāja dittiyaṁ bhāja ca. Rājati. Bhājati. Rājā. Rājinī. Vanarāji. Rājitvā. Virājitvā. Atra viññūnamatthavivaraṇe kosallajananatthaṁ silokaṁ racayāma –
anya-e0804n0:378: Ne’tassa iti vatvāna, dve janā kalahaṁ karuṁ.
anya-e0804n0:379_0: Ettha ca paṭhamapādassa dutiyapade ‘‘me ahi mahī’’ti chedo ‘‘puttā me atthi puttā
anya-e0804n0:379_1: matthī’’ti viya. ‘‘Mahi arāja mahārājā’’ti ca chedo ‘‘yopi ayaṁ yopāya’’nti viya.
anya-e0804n0:379_2: Ettha arājasaddo ‘‘atikaramakarācariyā’’ti ettha akarīti atthavācako akarasaddo viya
anya-e0804n0:379_3: ākhyātaparokkhāvibhattiko daṭṭhabbo. Arāja virocīti attho. Ayaṁ pana gāthāya piṇḍattho
anya-e0804n0:379_4: ‘‘mahārāja me ahi arāja, mama eva ahi arāja, na etassa iti vatvā dve ahituṇḍikajanā
anya-e0804n0:380_0: Ranja rāge. Bhikkhu cīvaraṁ rajati. Satto rūpādīsu rañjati. Rajanaṁ. Rajako. Rāgo.
anya-e0804n0:380_1: Virāgo. Haliddirāgo. Rājā. Rājinī. Imassa ca divādigaṇaṁ pattassa ‘‘rajjati virajjatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:380_2: rūpāni bhavanti. Tattha rajananti rajanavatthu. Rajakoti rajakāro vatthadhovanako.
anya-e0804n0:380_3: Rāgoti rajjanti sattā tena, sayaṁ vā rañjati, rañjanamattameva vā etanti rāgo, taṇhā.
anya-e0804n0:381: Rāgo lobho tasiṇā ca, taṇhā ejā visattikā;
anya-e0804n0:382: Satti āsatti mucchā ca, lubbhitattañca lubbhanā.
anya-e0804n0:383: Kāmo nikāmanā icchā, nikanti ca niyanti ca;
anya-e0804n0:384: Vanañca vanatho ceva, apekkhā bhavanetti ca.
anya-e0804n0:385: Anurodho ca sārāgo, saṅgo paṅko ca sibbinī;
anya-e0804n0:388_0: Virāgoti maggo nibbānañca. Rājāti pathavissaro. Ettha dhātudvayavasena nibbacanāni
anya-e0804n0:388_1: niyyante. Nānāsampattīhi rājati dibbati virocatīti rājā. Dānañca piyavacanañca atthacariyā
anya-e0804n0:388_2: ca samānattatā cāti imehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi attani mahājanaṁ rañjetītipi rājā.
anya-e0804n0:388_3: Rājinīti rājabhariyā. Tesaṁ abhidhānāni vuccante sahābhidhānantarehi –
anya-e0804n0:389: Rājā bhūpati devo ca, manujindo disampati;
anya-e0804n0:400: Bhaja sevāyaṁ. Bhajati. Bhajanā. Sambhajanā. Bhatti. Sambhatti. Bhattā.
anya-e0804n0:401_0: Yaja devapūjasaṅgatakaraṇadānadhammesu. Devapūjaggahaṇena buddhādipūjā gahitā. Saṅgatakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0804n0:401_1: samodhānakaraṇaṁ. Tathā hi adhimuttattheravatthumhi ‘‘yadatthi saṅgataṁ kiñci, bhavo
anya-e0804n0:401_2: vā yattha labbhatī’’ti gāthāyaṁ saṅgatasaddena samodhānaṁ vuttaṁ. Dānaṁ pariccāgo.
anya-e0804n0:401_3: Dhammo jhānasīlādi. Etesvatthesu yajadhātu vattati. Pupphehi buddhaṁ yajati. Devataṁ
anya-e0804n0:401_4: yajati. Devamanussehi bhagavā yajiyati. Ijjati. Yiṭṭhaṁ. Yañño. Yāgo. Dhammayāgo.
anya-e0804n0:401_5: Yajamāno sake pure. Yiṭṭhuṁ, yajituṁ. Puthuyaññaṁ yajitvāna. Soḷasaparikkhāraṁ mahāyaññaṁ kattukāmo.
anya-e0804n0:402: Majja saṁsuddhiyaṁ. Majjati. Bāhiraṁ parimajjati. Bhūmiṁ sammajjati. Majjanaṁ. Sammajjanī.
anya-e0804n0:403: Niñji suddhiyaṁ. Niñjati. Paniñjati. Niñjituṁ. Paniñjituṁ. Niñjitvā. Paniñjitvā. Ayaṁ pana pāḷi ‘‘tato tvaṁ moggallāna uṭṭhāyāsanā udakena akkhīni paniñjitvā disā anulokeyyāsī’’ti.
anya-e0804n0:405: Bhaja pāke. Tilāni bhajjati. Bhajjamānā tilāni ca.
anya-e0804n0:406: Uju ajjave. Ajjavaṁ ujubhāvo. Ojati. Uju.
anya-e0804n0:408: Ruja bhaṅge. Rujati. Rujā. Rogo. Ettha rujāti byādhi rujanaṭṭhena. Rogoti rujati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo, byādhiyeva, yo ‘‘ātaṅko’’tipi ‘‘ābādho’’tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:409_0: Bhuja koṭille. Āvipubbo aññatthesu ca. Urago bhujati. Ābhujati. Bhikkhu pallaṅkaṁ
anya-e0804n0:409_1: ābhujati, ūrubaddhāsanaṁ bandhatīti attho. Mahāsamuddo ābhujati, āvaṭṭatīti attho.
anya-e0804n0:409_2: Keci pana ‘‘osakkatī’’ti atthaṁ vadanti. ‘‘Vaṇṇadāna’’nti ābhujati, manasi karotīti
anya-e0804n0:409_3: attho. Mūlāni vibhujatīti mūlavibhujo, ratho. Ettha ca vibhujatīti chindati. Bhogo.
anya-e0804n0:409_4: Bhogī. Ābhogo. Ābhujitvā. Ettha ca bhogoti bhujayati kuṭilaṁ kariyatīti bhogo, ahisarīraṁ. Bhogīti sappo.
anya-e0804n0:410_0: Raji vijjhane. Nāgo dantehi bhūmiṁ rañjati. Ārañjati. Ettha ca ‘‘tathāgatarañjitaṁ
anya-e0804n0:410_1: itipī’’ti nettipāḷi nidassanaṁ. Tassattho ‘‘idaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:410_3: tebhūmakadhammānaṁ ārañjanaṭṭhānantipi vuccatī’’ti. Rañjitanti hi rañjati vijjhati
anya-e0804n0:410_4: etthāti ruñjitaṁ, rañjanaṭṭhānaṁ. ‘‘Idaṁ nesaṁ padakkanta’’ntiādimhi viya etassa
anya-e0804n0:411_0: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Īkārantoyaṁ dhātu, tenassa saniggahītāgamāni rūpāni na santi.
anya-e0804n0:411_1: Vejati. Vego. Dhammasaṁvego. Saṁvigo vegena palāyi. Nadīvego. Ūmivego , vātavego.
anya-e0804n0:411_2: Ettha dhammasaṁvegoti sahottappaṁ ñāṇaṁ. ‘‘Vego, javo, rayo’’ti ime ekatthā. Divādigaṇaṁ
anya-e0804n0:411_3: pana pattassa ‘‘vijjati saṁvijjati ubbijjatī’’ti rūpāni bhavanti dvigaṇikattā.
anya-e0804n0:412: Lajja lajjane. Lajjati. Lajjā. Lajjāti hirī. Yā ‘‘viriḷanā’’tipi vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:414_0: Kujja adhomukhīkaraṇe. Kujjati. Nikujjati. Ukkujjati. Paṭikujjati. Nikujjitaṁ vā
anya-e0804n0:414_1: ukkujjeyya. Aññissā pātiyā paṭikujjati. Avakujjo nipajjahaṁ. Tattha kujjati nikujjatīti
anya-e0804n0:414_2: imāni ‘‘carati vicaratī’’ti padāni viya samānatthāni, adhomukhaṁ karotīti hi attho.
anya-e0804n0:414_3: Ukkujjatīti uparimukhaṁ karoti. Paṭikujjatīti mukhe mukhaṁ ṭhapeti.
anya-e0804n0:415: Mujja osīdane. Mujjati. Nimujjati. Nimuggo. Ummuggo.
anya-e0804n0:419: Jhe cintāyaṁ. Jhāyati, nijjhāyati, upanijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, sajjhāyati. Jhānaṁ, nijjhānaṁ, upanijjhānaṁ, ujjhāyanaṁ, sajjhāyanaṁ. Nijjhatti. Upajjhā, upajjhāyo. Jhāyī, ajjhāyako.
anya-e0804n0:420_0: Tattha jhāyananti duvidhaṁ jhāyanaṁ sobhanamasobhanañca. Tesu sobhanaṁ ‘‘jhāyī tapati
anya-e0804n0:420_1: brāhmaṇo. Jhāyāmi akutobhayo’’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṁ. Asobhanaṁ pana ‘‘tattha tattha
anya-e0804n0:420_2: jhāyanto nisīdi. Adhomukho pajjhāyanto nisīdī’’tiādīsu daṭṭhabbaṁ. Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena
anya-e0804n0:420_3: vā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena vā jhāyanasīlo cintanasīlo. Jhāyī jhānavāti attho. Ajjhāyakoti
anya-e0804n0:420_4: idaṁ ‘‘na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho vāseṭṭha ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakātveva
anya-e0804n0:420_5: tatiyaṁ akkharaṁ upanibbatta’’nti evaṁ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:420_6: garahavacanaṁ uppannaṁ, idāni pana taṁ ajjhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti
anya-e0804n0:420_7: iminā atthena pasaṁsāvacanaṁ katvā voharantīti. Ayaṁ panattho ‘‘adhipubbassa i ajjhayane’’ti
anya-e0804n0:420_8: dhātussa vasena gahetabbo. Evaṁ adhipubbassa idhātussa vasena imassa dhātussa atthaparivattanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:421: Jhe dittiyaṁ. Dīpo jhāyati, dārūni jhāyanti. Ettha jhāyatīti jalati. Jhāyanajalanasaddā hi ekatthā.
anya-e0804n0:423: Ujjha ussagge. Ussaggo chaḍḍanaṁ. Ujjhati. Ujjhitaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:426_0: Ñā avabodhane. ‘‘Ñāti, ñanti, ñāsi. Ñātu, ñantu. Ñeyya, ñeyyu’’ntiādīni yathāpāvacanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:426_1: gahetabbāni. Ñāti, ñātako, añño, ñattaṁ, ñatti, paññatti, viññatti, saññatti, saññā,
anya-e0804n0:427_0: Tattha ñātīti jānāti. Puna ñātīti bandhu. So hi ‘‘ayaṁ amhāka’’nti ñātabbaṭṭhena
anya-e0804n0:427_1: ñātīti. Evaṁ ñātako. Aññoti diṭṭhadhammikādayo atthe na ñāti na jānātīti añño, avidvā
anya-e0804n0:427_2: bāloti attho. Ñattanti jānanabhāvo. ‘‘Yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṁ bālassa jāyatī’’ti
anya-e0804n0:427_3: pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Saññāṇanti cihanaṁ. Kārite ‘‘ñāpeti saññāpeti viññāpayatī’’tiādīni
anya-e0804n0:427_4: bhavanti. Yasmā pana ‘‘aññāti paṭivijjhati. Attatthaṁ vā paratthaṁ vā ñassati. Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:427_5: Ekacce nabbhaññaṁsu, ekacce abbhaññaṁsū’’ti pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā ñātītiādīni ākhyātikapadāni
anya-e0804n0:427_6: diṭṭhāniyeva honti nayavasena. Tathā hi aññātīti ettha āiti upasaggo, so parassakkharassa
anya-e0804n0:427_7: saññoguccāraṇicchāya rassaṁ katvā niddiṭṭho. Ñātīti sāsane ākhyātikapadaṁ diṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:427_8: tasmāyeva ‘‘ñāti, ñanti. Ñāsī’’tiādinā padamālākaraṇe nattheva doso.
anya-e0804n0:428: Ñā māraṇatosananisānesu. Māraṇaṁ jīvitindriyupacchedakaraṇaṁ. Tosanaṁ tuṭṭhi. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Ñatti. Manuññaṁ. Paññatti.
anya-e0804n0:429_0: Ettha ñattīti māretīti vā tosetīti vā nisetīti vā attho. Ayañca ñattisaddo ‘‘vatti
anya-e0804n0:429_1: etāyāti vācā’’ti ettha vattisaddo viya ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ādatteti
anya-e0804n0:429_2: ettha vibhattibhūtassa tesaddassa viya vibhattibhūtassa tisaddassa saññogabhāvo ca
anya-e0804n0:429_3: dhātuantassarassa rassattañca. Manuññanti manaṁ ābhuso ñeti tosetīti manuññaṁ. Ayamattho
anya-e0804n0:429_4: manasaddūpapadassa āpubbassimassa ñādhātussa vasena daṭṭhabbo. Paññattīti nānappakārato
anya-e0804n0:429_5: pavattinivāraṇena akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ñatti māraṇaṁ paññatti. Atha vā dhammaṁ suṇantānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:429_6: dhammadesanāya citte anekavidhena somanassuppādanaṁ. Atikhiṇabuddhīnaṁ anekavidhena
anya-e0804n0:429_7: ñāṇatikhiṇakaraṇañca paññatti nāma, tathā sotūnaṁ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca
anya-e0804n0:439: Laṭa bālye ca. Pubbāpekkhāya cakāro. Laṭati. Lāṭo.
anya-e0804n0:440: Saṭa rujāvisaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Rujā pīḷā. Visaraṇaṁ vippharaṇaṁ. Gatyāvasānaṁ gatiyā avasānaṁ osānaṁ abhāvakaraṇaṁ, nisīdananti vuttaṁ hoti. Saṭati. Sāṭo vuccati sāṭako.
anya-e0804n0:442: Khiṭa uttāsane. Kheṭati, ākheṭako, kheṭo, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito.
anya-e0804n0:444: Jaṭaghaṭa saṅghāte. Jaṭati. Jaṭā, jaṭilo, jaṭī. Antojaṭā bahijaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā. Kārite ‘‘so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭaṁ. Arahattamaggakkhaṇe vijaṭeti nāmā’’ti payogo.
anya-e0804n0:445: Bhaṭa bhattiyaṁ. Bhaṭati. Bhaṭo. Vetanaṁ bhaṭako yathā.
anya-e0804n0:446: Taṭa ussaye. Ussayo āroho ubbedho. Taṭati. Taṭo, giritaṭo, nadītaṭo, taṭī, taṭaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:449_0: Piṭa saddasaṅghāṭesu. Peṭati. Peṭako, piṭakaṁ. Piṭakasaddo ‘‘mā piṭakasampadānenā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:449_1: pariyattiyaṁ dissati. ‘‘Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭakaṁ ādāyā’’tiādīsu yasmiṁ kismiñci bhājane.
anya-e0804n0:450: Haṭa dittiyaṁ. Haṭati. Hāṭakaṁ, haṭakaṁ. Yaṁ jātarūpaṁ haṭakanti vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:455_0: Aṭa paṭa iṭa kiṭa kaṭa gatiyaṁ. Aṭati. Paṭati. Eṭati. Keṭati. Kaṭati. Paṭo icceva
anya-e0804n0:455_1: nāmikapadaṁ diṭṭhaṁ. Paṭati jiṇṇabhāvaṁ gacchatīti paṭo. Paṭoti vatthaṁ. Vatthassa hi anekāni nāmāni –
anya-e0804n0:456: Paṭo coḷo sāṭako ca, vāso vasanamaṁsukaṁ;
anya-e0804n0:461: Ruṭi luṭi theyye. Ruṇṭati. Luṇṭati. Ruṇṭako. Luṇṭako.
anya-e0804n0:466: Ghaṭa cetāyaṁ. Ghaṭati. Ghaṭo. Ghaṭo vuccati kumbho. Imāni tadabhidhānāni –
anya-e0804n0:467: Ghaṭo kumbho ghaṭī kumbhī, tuṇḍikiro tu ukkhalī;
anya-e0804n0:469: Caṭa bhaṭa paribhāsane deṭa ca. Caṭati. Bhaṭati. Deṭati.
anya-e0804n0:472: Cuṭa chuṭa kuṭa chedane. Cuṭati. Chuṭati. Kuṭati.
anya-e0804n0:479_0: Ṭhāgatinivattiyaṁ. Gatinivatti uppajjamānassa gamanassupacchedo. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:479_1: Patiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭheti. Saṇṭhāti. Saṇṭhahati. Adhiṭṭhahati. Upaṭṭhahati.
anya-e0804n0:479_2: Ṭhātu. Tiṭṭhatu. Tiṭṭheyya. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhu. Aṭṭhā, aṭṭhū, aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṁsu. Yāvassa
anya-e0804n0:479_3: kāyo ṭhassati. Tiṭṭhissati. Upassuti tiṭṭhissatha. Aṭṭhissā, aṭṭhissaṁsu. Atiṭṭhissā,
anya-e0804n0:479_4: atiṭṭhissaṁsu. Ṭhātuṁ, upaṭṭhātuṁ. Upaṭṭhahituṁ. Adhiṭṭhātuṁ. Adhiṭṭhahituṁ. Ṭhatvā,
anya-e0804n0:479_5: adhiṭṭhitvā. Upaṭṭhahitvā, adhiṭṭhahitvā. Ṭhānaṁ, ṭhiti, saṇṭhiti, avaṭṭhiti. Saṇṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:479_6: paṭṭhānaṁ. Upaṭṭhāko, ṭhito. Pabbataṭṭho bhūmaṭṭho. Upaṭṭhahaṁ iccādīni.
anya-e0804n0:480_0: Tattha ṭhānasaddo issariyaṭhitikhaṇakāraṇesu dissati. ‘‘Kiṁ panāyasmā devānamindo
anya-e0804n0:480_1: kammaṁ katvā imaṁ ṭhānaṁ patto’’tiādīsu hi issariye dissati. ‘‘Ṭhānakusalo hoti akkhaṇavedhī’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:480_3: ñatvā aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānaso’’tiādīsu kāraṇe. Kāraṇañhi yasmā tattha phalaṁ tiṭṭhati
anya-e0804n0:485_0: Paṭhaviyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ. Dhammaṁ paṭhati. Pāṭho, nakkhattapāṭhako, so horapāṭhakaṁ
anya-e0804n0:485_1: pucchi. Sabbapāṭhī bhavissati. Paṭhituṁ, paṭhitave, paṭhitvā, paṭhitvāna, paṭhituna, paṭhiya, paṭhiyāna.
anya-e0804n0:486_0: Evaṁvidhaṁ tuṁpaccayantādivibhāgaṁ sabbattha yathārahaṁ vattukāmāpi gantha vitthārabhayena
anya-e0804n0:486_1: na vadāma. Avuttopi īdiso vibhāgo nayānusārena yathāsambhavaṁ sabbattha yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:486_2: Yattha pana pāḷinidassanādiviseso icchitabbo hoti, tatthevetaṁ dassessāma.
anya-e0804n0:487_0: Vaṭha thūliye. Vaṭhati. Vaṭharo. Vaṭharoti thūlaghanasarīrasmiṁ vattabbavacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:487_1: Tathā hi vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘vaṭharoti thūlo, thūlo ca ghanasarīro cāyaṁ bhikkhūti
anya-e0804n0:491: Sāṭha balakkāre. Balakkāro nāma attano balena yathājjhāsayaṁ dabbalassa abhibhavanaṁ. Sāṭhati. Sāṭho.
anya-e0804n0:492: Uṭha ruṭha luṭha upaghāte. Oṭhati. Roṭhati. Loṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:494: Saṭha ketave ca. Pubbatthesu cakāro. Saṭhati. Saṭho saṭhoti kerāṭiko vuccati.
anya-e0804n0:496: Kuṭhi luṭhi ālassiye ca. Cakāro pubbatthe ca. Kuṇṭhati. Kuṇṭho. Luṇṭhati. Luṇṭho.
anya-e0804n0:498: Ruṭhi luṭhi aṭhi gatiyaṁ. Ruṇṭhati. Luṇṭhati. Aṇṭhati.
anya-e0804n0:499: Veṭha veṭhane. Veṭhati, nibbeṭhati. Veṭhanaṁ, nibbeṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:502: Eṭha heṭha vibādhāyaṁ. Eṭhati. Heṭhati. Viheṭhati. Viheṭhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:508: Ḍi vihāyasagatiyaṁ gamanamatte ca. Ḍeti, ḍayati. Ḍemāno. Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna. Ye maṁ pure paccuḍḍenti.
anya-e0804n0:510: Ito bahiddhā pāsaṇḍā, diṭṭhīsu pasīdanti te;
anya-e0804n0:511: Na tesaṁ dhammaṁ rocemi, na te dhammassa kovidā.
anya-e0804n0:512: Ettha ca pāsaṇḍāti pāsaṁ ḍentīti pāsaṇḍā, sattānaṁ cittesu diṭṭhipāsaṁ khipantīti attho. Atha vā taṇhāpāsaṁ diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti uḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍā.
anya-e0804n0:517: Huḍi piḍi saṅghāte. Huṇḍati. Piṇḍati. Piṇḍo.
anya-e0804n0:520: Vaḍi maḍi veṭhane. Vaṇḍati. Maṇḍati. Maṇḍalaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:523: Tuḍi toḷane. Tuṇḍati. Tuṇḍo. Tuṇḍenādāya gaccheyya.
anya-e0804n0:525: Caḍi kope. Caṇḍati. Caṇḍo. Caṇḍālo, caṇḍikkaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:528_0: Paḍi gatiyaṁ. Paṇḍati. Paṇḍā, paṇḍito. Ettha paṇḍāti paññā. Sā hi sukhumesupi atthesu
anya-e0804n0:528_1: paṇḍati gacchati dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādikampi ākāraṁ jānātīti ‘‘paṇḍā’’ti vuccati. Paṇḍitoti
anya-e0804n0:528_2: paṇḍāya ito gato pavattoti paṇḍito. Atha vā sañjātā paṇḍā etassāti paṇḍito. Paṇḍati
anya-e0804n0:528_3: ñāṇagatiyā gacchatītipi paṇḍito. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘paṇḍantīti paṇḍitā.
anya-e0804n0:534: Vaḍḍha vaḍḍhane. Vaḍḍhati. Sirivaḍḍhako, dhanavaḍḍhako, vaḍḍhito, buḍḍho. Ettha ca vakārassa bakāro, akārassa cukāro.
anya-e0804n0:535: Kaḍḍha ākaḍḍhane. Kaḍḍhati, ākaḍḍhati, nikaḍḍhati. Akāmā parikaḍḍhanti, ulūkaññeva vāyasā.
anya-e0804n0:538_0: Aṇa raṇa vaṇa bhaṇa maṇa kaṇa sadde. Aṇati. Aṇako brāhmaṇo. Raṇati. Raṇaṁ. Vaṇati.
anya-e0804n0:538_1: Vāṇako. Bhaṇati. Bhāṇako. Maṇati. Maṇiko. Kaṇati. Kāṇo. Tattha brāhmaṇoti brahmaṁ
anya-e0804n0:538_2: aṇatīti brāhmaṇo, mante sajjhāyatīti attho. Akkharacintakā pana ‘‘brahmuno apaccaṁ
anya-e0804n0:538_3: brāhmaṇo’’ti vadanti. Ariyā pana bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇoti.
anya-e0804n0:539: Brāhmaṇo sottiyo vippo, bhovādī brahmabandhu ca;
anya-e0804n0:541: Raṇasaddo ‘‘saraṇā dhammā araṇā dhammā’’tiādīsu kilesesu vattati. Kilesā hi raṇanti kandanti etehīti raṇāti vuccanti.
anya-e0804n0:544_0: Ettha yuddhe vattati. Raṇaṁ katvāti hi yuddhaṁ katvāti attho. ‘‘Tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca
anya-e0804n0:544_1: raṇaṁ karontā, dhāviṁsu te aṭṭhadisā samantato’’ti ettha cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇe vattati.
anya-e0804n0:544_2: Raṇaṁ karontāti hi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṁ karontāti attho. Evaṁ atthavivaraṇampi saddasaṅkhātamatthaṁ
anya-e0804n0:544_3: antoyeva katvā adhippāyatthavasena kataṁ, na dhātunānatthavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Atha
anya-e0804n0:544_4: vā dhātūnamatthātisayayogopi bhavati, tena evaṁ atthavivaraṇaṁ katantipi daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:545: Bhaṇa bhaṇane. Parittaṁ bhaṇati, vacanaṁ bhaṇati. Dīghabhāṇako, piyabhāṇī, bhāṇavāro. Ettha bhāṇavāroti –
anya-e0804n0:554: Ghiṇi ghuṇi ghaṇi gahaṇe. Ghiṇṇati. Ghuṇṇati. Ghaṇṇati.
anya-e0804n0:556: Paṇa byavahāre, thutiyañca. Paṇati vāṇijo, vohāraṁ karoti iccattho. Saddho buddhaṁ paṇati, thomayati iccattho, āpaṇaṁ, sāpaṇo gāmo.
anya-e0804n0:561: Pīṇa pīṇane. Pīṇanaṁ paripuṇṇatā. Pīṇati. Pīṇo divā na bhuñjati, pīṇorakkhaṁsabāhu.
anya-e0804n0:564: Saṇa abyattasadde. Saṇati. Saṇateva brahmāraññaṁ. Saṇatevāti nadati viya.
anya-e0804n0:566: Puṇa nipuṇe. Puṇati, nipuṇati. Nipuṇadhammo. Ettha ca nipuṇasaṇhasukhumasaddā vevacanasaddā kusalachekadakkhasaddā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:571: Phuṇa vikiraṇe vidhunane ca. Phuṇati. Aṅgārakāsuṁ apare phuṇanti.
anya-e0804n0:577_0: Te pālane. Pālanaṁ rakkhaṇaṁ. Tāyati. Tāṇaṁ, gottaṁ, nakkhattaṁ. Aghassa tātā. Kicchenādhigatā
anya-e0804n0:577_1: bhogā, te tāto vidhami dhamaṁ. Tattha gottanti gaṁ tāyatīti gottaṁ. ‘‘Gotamo kassapo’’ti
anya-e0804n0:577_2: hi ādinā pavattamānaṁ gaṁ vacanaṁ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṁsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti
anya-e0804n0:577_3: gottaṁ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, tathā abhidhānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:577_4: abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. Ko
anya-e0804n0:577_5: pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṁ tassa kulassa ādipurisasammuditaṁ taṁkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṁ sāmaññarūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:578_0: Nakkhattanti visamagatiyā agantvā attano vīthiyāva gamanena nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyati
anya-e0804n0:578_1: rakkhatīti nakkhattaṁ, taṁ pana assayujādivasena sattavīsatividhaṁ hoti. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n0:578_2: assayujo bharaṇī kattikā rohaṇī migasiro addā punabbasu phusso assaliso māgho pubbaphagguṇī
anya-e0804n0:578_3: uttaraphagguṇī hattho cittaṁ svāti visākhā anurādhā jeṭṭhā mūlaṁ pubbāsaḷhaṁ uttarāsaḷhaṁ
anya-e0804n0:578_4: sāvaṇaṁ dhanasiṭṭhā satabhisattaṁ pubbabhaddapadaṁ uttarabhaddapadaṁ revatī cāti
anya-e0804n0:578_5: sattavīsati nakkhattāni. Tāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṁ īsakampi na vijahanti kiñci
anya-e0804n0:578_6: sīghaṁ kiñci dandhaṁ, kadāci sīghaṁ, kadāci dandhaṁ, etto ito cāti evaṁ visamagatiyā
anya-e0804n0:578_7: agantvā yantacakke paṭipāṭiyā yojitāni viya samappamāṇagatiyā attano vīthiyāva gacchantāni
anya-e0804n0:578_8: maṇḍalākārena sineruṁ parivattanti. Evaṁ imāni nakkhanaṁ gamanaṁ tāyanti rakkhantīti
anya-e0804n0:578_9: nakkhattānīti vuccanti. Porāṇā pana kharadhātuvasena ‘‘nakkharanti na nassantīti
anya-e0804n0:578_10: nakkhattānī’’ti āvocuṁ, ‘‘nakkhattaṁ joti rikkhaṁ taṁ’’ iccetāni nakkhattatārakānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:578_11: nāmāni. ‘‘Uḷu tārā tārakā’’ti imāni pana sabbāsampi tārakānaṁ sādhāraṇanāmāni. Osadhīti
anya-e0804n0:579_0: Citi saññāṇe. Saññāṇaṁ cihanaṁ lakkhaṇakaraṇaṁ. Cetati. Cihanaṁ karotīti attho. Īkārantavasena
anya-e0804n0:579_1: vuttattā asmā dhātuto saki saṅkāyanti dhātuto viya niggahītāgamo na hoti. Esa nayo
anya-e0804n0:580_0: Pata gatiyaṁ. Patati. Papatati papātaṁ, papateyyahaṁ. Pāpattaṁ nirayaṁ bhusaṁ. Ahaṁsaddena
anya-e0804n0:580_1: yojetabbaṁ, pāpattaṁ papatitosmīti attho. Pāpattha nirayaṁ bhusaṁ, sokumāroti yojetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:580_2: pāpattha papatitoti attho. Parokkhāpadañhietaṁ dvayaṁ. ‘‘Pāvadaṁ pāvadā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:580_3: viya upasaggapadassa dīghabhāvo, tato aṁsaddassa ttaṁādeso, asaddassa ca tthādeso
anya-e0804n0:581_0: Atasātaccagamane. Sātaccagamanaṁ nirantaragamanaṁ. Atati. Yasmā pana atadhātu sātaccagamanatthavācikā,
anya-e0804n0:581_1: tasmā bhavābhavaṁ dhāvanto jātijarābyādhimaraṇādibhedaṁ anekavihitaṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ
anya-e0804n0:581_2: atati satataṁ gacchati pāpuṇāti adhigacchatīti attātipi nibbacanamicchitabbaṁ. Atthantaravasena
anya-e0804n0:581_3: pana ‘‘āhito ahaṁmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo’’ti ca ‘‘sukhadukkhaṁ adati anubhavatīti
anya-e0804n0:581_4: attā’’ti ca ‘‘attamanoti pītisomanassena gahitamano’’ti ca attho daṭṭhabbo, yattha
anya-e0804n0:581_5: yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā atthassa gahetabbatoti.
anya-e0804n0:583_0: Ati bandhane. Antati. Antaṁ. Antiyatibandhiyati antaguṇenāti antaṁ. Idha anta saddassa
anya-e0804n0:583_1: atthuddhāro vuccate ‘‘antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariya’’nti ettha dvattiṁsākārantogadhaṁ kuṇapantaṁ
anya-e0804n0:583_2: antaṁ nāma. ‘‘Kāyabandhanassa anto jīrati. Haritantaṁ vā’’ti ettha antimamariyādanto
anya-e0804n0:583_3: anto nāma. ‘‘Antamidaṁ bhikkhave jīvikāna’’nti ettha lāmakanto. ‘‘Sakkāyo eko anto’’ti
anya-e0804n0:583_4: ettha koṭṭhāsanto. ‘‘Esevanto dukkhassa sappaccayasaṅkhayā’’ti ettha koṭanto. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n0:586_0: Kita nivāse rogāpanayane ca. Ketati. Sāketaṁ na garaṁ, niketo, niketaṁ pāvisi. Āmodamāno
anya-e0804n0:586_1: gacchati sanniketaṁ. Tikicchati, cikicchati, cikicchā, cikicchako. Tattha sāketanti
anya-e0804n0:587_0: Yata patiyatane. Patiyatanaṁ vāyāmakaraṇaṁ. Yatati. Yati, yatavā, payatanaṁ, āyatanaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:587_1: lokāyataṁ. Ettha āyatananti āyatanato āyatanaṁ, cakkhurūpādīni. Etāni hi taṁdvārārammaṇacittacetasikā
anya-e0804n0:587_2: dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti etesūti
anya-e0804n0:587_3: ‘‘āyatanānī’’ti vuccanti. Ettha pana nītanudhātūnaṁ vasenapi āyatanasaddattho vattabbo
anya-e0804n0:588_0: Āyatanasaddo nivāsaṭṭhāne ākare samosaraṇaṭṭhāne sañjātidese kāraṇe ca. Tathā hi
anya-e0804n0:588_2: ‘‘Suvaṇṇāyatanaṁ rajatāyatana’’ntiādīsu ākare. Sāsane pana ‘‘manorame āyatane, sevanti
anya-e0804n0:588_4: sañjātidese. ‘‘Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane’’tiādīsu kāraṇe
anya-e0804n0:588_5: vattatīti veditabbo. So ca nānāpavattinimittavasena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n0:589: Nivāse ākāre ceva, jātidese ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0804n0:591_0: Lokāyataṁ nāma ‘‘sabbaṁ ucchiṭṭhaṁ, sabbaṁ nucchiṭṭhaṁ. Seto kāko, kāḷo bako iminā
anya-e0804n0:591_1: ca iminā ca kāraṇenā’’ti evamādiniratthakakāraṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ titthiyasatthaṁ, yaṁ
anya-e0804n0:591_2: loke ‘‘vitaṇḍasattha’’nti vuccati, yañca sandhāya bodhisatto asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito
anya-e0804n0:591_3: ‘‘na seve lokāyatikaṁ, netaṁ paññāya vaḍḍhana’’nti āha. Āyatiṁ hitaṁ tena loko na
anya-e0804n0:591_4: yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṁ, kintaṁ? Vitaṇḍasatthaṁ. Tañhi ganthaṁ nissāya sattā
anya-e0804n0:591_5: puññakriyāya cittampi na uppādenti. Aññatthāpi hi evaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘lokāyatasippanti
anya-e0804n0:591_6: ‘kāko seto, aṭṭhīnaṁ setattā, balākā rattā, lohitassa rattattā’ti evamādinayappavattaṁ
anya-e0804n0:592: Yuta juta bhāsane. Bhāsanaṁ udīraṇaṁ. Yotati. Jotati.
anya-e0804n0:593_0: Jutadittiyaṁ. Jotati, vijjotati. Juti, joti. Kārite ‘‘joteti, jotayitvāna saddhamma’’nti
anya-e0804n0:593_1: payogā. Ettha ca jutīti āloko siri vā. Jotīti patāpo. Atha vā jotīti candādīni. Vuttampi
anya-e0804n0:593_3: Atha vā ‘‘joti jotiparāyaṇo’’ti vacanato yo koci jotati khattiyakulādīsu jātattā
anya-e0804n0:594_0: Sitavaṇṇo. Sitadhātu setavaṇṇe vattati. Kiñcāpettha vaṇṇasāmaññaṁ vuttaṁ, tathāpi
anya-e0804n0:594_1: idha nīlapītādīsu setavaṇṇoyeva gahetabbo payogadassanavasena. Setati. Setaṁ vatthaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:595: Setaṁ sitaṁ suci sukkaṁ, paṇḍaraṁ dhavalampi ca;
anya-e0804n0:597: Vatu vattane. Vattati, pavattati, saṁvattati, anuvattati, parivattati. Pavattaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:598: Kilota addabhāve. Addabhāvo tintabhāvo. Kilotati, pakilotati, temetīti attho. Kārite pakiloteti, pakilotayati. Uṇhodakasmiṁ pakilotayitvā, temetvāti attho.
anya-e0804n0:600: Kita ñāṇe. Ketati. Ketanaṁ, ketako, saṅketo.
anya-e0804n0:602: Kati chedane. Maṁsaṁ kantati, vikantati, ayokanto. Sallakanto mahāvīro. Mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase.
anya-e0804n0:603: Catī hiṁsāgandhesu. Īkārantattā imasmā niggahītāgamo na hoti. Catati.
anya-e0804n0:606_0: Thāgatinivattiyaṁ. Thāti. Avatthā, vavatthānaṁ, vavatthitaṁ, vanatho. ‘‘Chetvā vanaṁ
anya-e0804n0:606_1: vanathañcā’’ti ettha hi mahantā rukkhā vanaṁ nāma, khuddakā pana tasmiṁ vane ṭhitattā
anya-e0804n0:607: Thu thutiyaṁ. Thavati, abhitthavati. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuti, abhitthuti.
anya-e0804n0:608: Yadi hi rūpinī siyā, paññā me vasumatī na sameyya;
anya-e0804n0:610: Tehi thutippasattho so, yenidaṁ thavitaṁ ñāṇaṁ, buddhaseṭṭho ca thomito. Tatra thavanāti pasaṁsanā. Pasaṁsāya hi anekāni nāmāni.
anya-e0804n0:611: Thavanā ca pasaṁsā ca, silāghā vaṇṇanā thuti;
anya-e0804n0:613_0: The saddasaṅghātesu. Thīyati, patitthīyati. Thī. Atrimā pāḷiyo – abhisajjati kuppati
anya-e0804n0:613_1: byāpajjati patitthīyati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti. Thiyo naṁ paribhāsiṁsūti.
anya-e0804n0:613_2: Tatra ‘‘thīyati patitthīyatī’’timāni ekārassīyādesavasena sambhūtāni. Thīyati saṅghātaṁ
anya-e0804n0:613_3: gacchati gabbho etissāti thī. Ācariyā pana itthīsaddasseva evaṁ nibbacanaṁ vadanti, na thīsaddassa.
anya-e0804n0:614: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti thī iti no ruci;
anya-e0804n0:615: Gabbho thīyati etissā, iti itthīti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n0:617: Ayaṁ vinicchayo patto, nicchayaṁ bho suṇātha me.
anya-e0804n0:620: Appānaṁ bahutā ñāye, gahite sati yujjati;
anya-e0804n0:621: Tathā hi ‘‘dve duve, taṇhā, tasiṇā’’ti nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:624: Icchatīti nare itthī, icchāpetīti vā pana;
anya-e0804n0:627: Itthī thī vanitā nārī, abalā bhīru sundarī;
anya-e0804n0:628: Kantā sīmaninī mātu-gāmo piyā ca kāminī.
anya-e0804n0:631: Gorī ca dārikā kaññā, kumārī ca kumārikā;
anya-e0804n0:633_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccati. Dasavassikā kaññāti vuccati. Anibbiddhā
anya-e0804n0:633_1: vā yobbanitthī kaññāti vuccati. Dvādasavassikā kumārītipi vuccati kumārikātipi. Atho
anya-e0804n0:633_2: jaraṁ appattā yuvatītipi taruṇītipi māṇavikātipi vuccati. Jaraṁ pattā pana therītipi
anya-e0804n0:633_3: mahallikātipi vuccati. Purisesupi ayaṁ nayo yathārahaṁ veditabbo.
anya-e0804n0:634_0: Kiñcāpettha evaṁ niyamo vutto, tathāpi katthaci aniyamavasenapi vohāro pavattati.
anya-e0804n0:634_1: Tathā hi ‘‘rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘acchā kaṇhājinaṁ kañña’’nti
anya-e0804n0:634_2: ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsaddena vattabbā, sā kaññāsaddenapi
anya-e0804n0:634_3: vattabbā jātā. Yāpi ca kaññāsaddena vattabbā, sāpi dārikāsaddena vattabbā jātā. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:634_4: ‘‘rājā kumāramādāya, rājaputtī ca dārika’’nti ca ‘‘kumāriye upaseniye, niccaṁ nigaḷamaṇḍite’’ti
anya-e0804n0:634_5: ca imāsaṁ pana pāḷīnaṁ vasena yā itthī dārikāsadena vattabbā, sā kumārikāsaddenapi
anya-e0804n0:634_6: vattabbā jātā. Yā ca pana kumārīsaddena vattabbā, sāpi dārikāsaddena vattabbā jātā.
anya-e0804n0:634_7: Apicettha ‘‘rājakaññā rucā nāmā’’ti ca ‘‘tato maddimpi nhāpesuṁ, sivikaññā samāgatā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:634_8: ca imāsaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ dassanato yā anibbiddhā vā hotu nibbiddhā vā, yāva jaraṁ
anya-e0804n0:634_9: na pāpuṇāti, tāva sā kaññāyeva nāmātipi veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:635_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ – yaṁ tumhehi ‘‘aṭṭhavassikā gorītipi dārikātipi vuccatī’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0804n0:635_1: etasmiṁ pana vacane ‘‘yadāhaṁ dārako homi, jātiyā aṭṭhavassiko’’ti vacanato aṭṭhavasso
anya-e0804n0:635_2: dārako hotu, ‘‘tatthaddasakumāraṁ so, ramamānaṁ sake pure’’ti pāḷiyaṁ pana puttadārehi
anya-e0804n0:635_3: saṁvaddho vessantaramahārājā kathaṁ ‘‘kumāro’’ti vattuṁ yujjissati dvādasavassātikkantattā?
anya-e0804n0:635_4: Yujjateva bhagavato icchāvasena. Bhagavā hi dhammissarattā vohārakusalatāya ca yaṁ
anya-e0804n0:635_5: yaṁ veneyyajanānurūpaṁ desanaṁ desetuṁ icchati, taṁ taṁ deseti eva, tasmā bhagavatā
anya-e0804n0:635_6: tassa mātāpitūnaṁ atthitaṁ sandhāya kumāraparihārena vaddhitattañca evaṁ desanā katā.
anya-e0804n0:635_7: Tathā hi āyasmā kumārakassapo kumāraparihārena vaddhitattā mahallakopi samāno kumārakassapotveva
anya-e0804n0:635_8: vohariyati. ‘‘Na vāyaṁ kumārako mattamaññāsī’’ti ettha pana sirasmiṁ palitesu jātesupi
anya-e0804n0:635_9: āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āyasmā mahākassapo tasmiṁ there adhimattavissāso hutvā komāravādena
anya-e0804n0:635_10: ovadanto kumārakoti avocāti gahetabbaṁ. Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘sattā jātadivasato
anya-e0804n0:635_11: paṭṭhāya yāva pañcadasavassaṁ, tāva kumārakā, bālāti ca vuccanti, tato paraṁ vīsativassāni yuvāno’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:636: Mantha mattha viloḷane. Manthati. Manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya. Abhimatthati dummedhaṁ vajiraṁvamhamayaṁ maṇiṁ. Sineruṁ matthaṁ katvā.
