anya-e0804n0:1145_0: Ettha namoti padaṁ nipātesupi labbhati. Tena hi paccattopayogavacanāni abhinnarūpāni
anya-e0804n0:1145_1: dissanti ‘‘devarāja namo tyatthu. Namo katvā mahesino’’ti. Upasaggehipi ayaṁ yojetabbā
anya-e0804n0:1146: Khamu sahane. Khamati. Khanti. Khamo, khamanaṁ, evaṁ bhāve. Kattari pana ‘‘khantā. Khamitā. Khamo hoti sītassapi uṇhassapī’’ti payogā.
anya-e0804n0:1152: Gamugatiyaṁ. Gacchati. Gamako. Gato. Gati. Gamanaṁ. Kārite ‘‘gameti, gamayati, gacchāpetī’’tiādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n0:1153_0: Ramu kīḷāyaṁ. Ramati. Viramati. Paṭiviramati. Uparamati. Ārati. Virati. Paṭivirati.
anya-e0804n0:1153_1: Uparati. Veramaṇi. Viramaṇaṁ. Rati. Ramaṇaṁ. Rato. Ārato virato paṭivirato. Uparato, uparamo. Ārāmo.
anya-e0804n0:1155: Dhīratthu taṁ visaṁ vantaṁ, yamahaṁ jīvitakāraṇā;
anya-e0804n0:1156: Vantaṁ paccāvamissāmi, mataṁ me jīvitā varaṁ.
anya-e0804n0:1157_0: Tattha vammikoti vamatīti, vantakoti, vantussayoti, vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1157_1: So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi
anya-e0804n0:1157_2: vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā mukhatuṇḍakena ukkhittapaṁsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi
anya-e0804n0:1157_3: porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1157_4: deve vassantepi na vippakirayati, nidāghepi tato paṁsumuṭṭhiṁ gahetvā tasmiṁ muṭṭhinā
anya-e0804n0:1157_5: pīḷiyamāne sinehova nikkhamati, evaṁ vantasinehasambandhoti vammiko.
anya-e0804n0:1158_0: Ettha pana ‘‘bhagavā, himavā’’tiādīni padāni na kevalaṁ vantupaccayavaseneva nipphādetabbāni,
anya-e0804n0:1158_1: atha kho vamudhātuvasenapi nipphādetabbāni, tenāha visuddhimaggakārako ‘‘yasmā pana
anya-e0804n0:1158_2: tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṁ gamanamanena vantaṁ, tasmā ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’ti vattabbe
anya-e0804n0:1158_3: bhavasaddato bhakāraṁ, gamanasaddato gakāraṁ, vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṁ katvā
anya-e0804n0:1158_4: ādāya bhagavāti vuccati, yathā loke ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti vattabbe mekhalā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:1159_0: Ettha, siyā ‘‘visamamidaṁ nidassanaṁ, yena ‘mehanassa khassa mālā’ti ettha mekārakhakāralākārānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1159_1: kamato gahaṇaṁ dissati, ‘‘bhavesu vantagamano’ti ettha pana bhakāravakāragakārānaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1159_2: kamato gahaṇaṁ na dissatī’’ti? Saccaṁ, idha pana ‘‘aggāhito, vijjācaraṇasampanno’’tiādīsu
anya-e0804n0:1159_3: viya guṇasaddassa paranipātavasena ‘‘bhavesu gamanavanto’’ti vattabbepi evamavatvā
anya-e0804n0:1159_4: saddasatthe yebhuyyena guṇasaddānaṁ pubbanipātabhvassa icchitattā saddasatthavidūnaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1159_5: kesañca viññūnaṁ manaṁ tosetuṁ ‘‘bhagavā’’ti pade akkharakkamaṁ anapekkhitvā atthamattanidassanavasena
anya-e0804n0:1159_8: vā ‘‘hatthacchinno’’ti vā padesu yathā tathā ṭhitesupi atthassa ayutti nāma natthi
anya-e0804n0:1160_0: Vedajātotiādīsu pana ṭhānesu atthevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Evaṁ visuddhimagge ‘‘bhagavā’’ti
anya-e0804n0:1160_1: padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā, taṭṭīkāyampi ca dassitā ‘‘bhage vamīti
anya-e0804n0:1160_2: bhagavā. Bhāge vamīti bhagavā’’ti. Nibbacanaṁ pana evaṁ veditabbaṁ – bhagasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1160_3: siriṁ issariyaṁ yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṁ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayīti bhagavā.
anya-e0804n0:1160_4: Atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṁ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokā,
anya-e0804n0:1163_0: Tathā khandhāyatanadhātādibhede dhammakoṭṭhāse sabbaṁ papañca sabbaṁ yogaṁ sabbaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1163_1: ganthaṁ sabbaṁ saṁyojanaṁ samucchinditvā amataṁ dhātuṁ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri
anya-e0804n0:1163_2: anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvamīti bhagavā. Atha vā sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje
anya-e0804n0:1163_3: hīnappaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho
anya-e0804n0:1165: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bagavā mato.
anya-e0804n0:1166_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana himavāti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi nipphatti dassitā. Tathā
anya-e0804n0:1166_1: hi sambhavajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttoti himavā. Gimhakāle
anya-e0804n0:1166_2: himaṁ vamatīti himavā’’ti vuttaṁ. Evaṁ jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘himavā’’ti padassa vamudhātuvasenapi
anya-e0804n0:1166_3: nipphatti dassitā, ayaṁ nayo īdisesu ṭhānesupi netabbo. ‘‘Guṇavāgaṇavā’’tiādīsu pana
anya-e0804n0:1166_4: na netabbo. Yadi nayeyya, ‘‘guṇavā gaṇavā’’ti padānaṁ ‘‘nigguṇo parihīnaguṇo’’ti
anya-e0804n0:1166_5: evamādiattho bhaveyya, tasmā ayaṁ nayo sabbatthapi na netabbo. Ettha siyā ‘‘yadi
anya-e0804n0:1166_7: sijjhantī’’ti? Yathā ‘‘bhagavā’’ti padaṁ niruttinayena sijjhati, tathā tānipi teneva
anya-e0804n0:1166_8: sijjhanti. Acinteyyo hi niruttinayo kevalaṁ atthayuttipaṭibandhamattova, atthayuttiyaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1166_9: sati nipphādetumasakkuṇeyyānipi rūpāni aneneva sijjhanti. Ettha ca yaṁ niruttilakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0804n0:1166_10: āharitvā dassetabbaṁ siyā, taṁ upari rūpanipphādanādhikāre udāharaṇehi saddhiṁ pakāsessāma.
anya-e0804n0:1171: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññunaṁ
